The Book of Exodus

1 these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el of·the⁺ ⁼having·been·¬entered to °Egypt ¬together to·Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼father of·them ¬each to·¬whole·family of·them they·came·to

2 ¬Reuben ⁼¬Simeon ⁼¬Levi ⁼Yudah

3 ⁼¬Issachar ⁼¬Zebulun and ¬Benjamin

4 Dan and ¬Naphtali ⁼¬Gad and ¬Asher

5 ⁼Yosef then was in to·Egypt they·were then all⁺ ⁼souls⁺ out of·Ya‘aqob five and seventy

6 ¬deceased then Yosef and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and all ⁼the ⁼generation ⁼that

7 then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·were·¬grown and they·were·¬multiplied and ¬extensive⁺ they·were·generated·themselves and they·¬prevailed ¬very ¬very ¬multiplied then the ⁼earth °them

8 ¬arose then king ⁼óther upon °Egypt which not had·¬seen °the ⁼Yosef

9 told then to·the ⁼nation of·him ¬¡see! the ⁼¬gens of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el great ⁼¬multitude and ¬is·strong ¬above °us

10 ¬come therefore we·should·¬be·cunning·ourselves °them ¬lest should·be·¬multiplied and ¬when iᵮ should·¬happen to·us war they·will·be·¬added and these⁺ unto °the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ and ¬waging·war °us they·will·come·out·themselves out of·the ⁼earth

11 and ¬knew to·them °¬masters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ so·that they·should·do·evil °them in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ and they·¬built °cities⁺ ⁼¬fortified⁺ to·the ⁼Pharaoh °the·one also Pithōm and Ramessē and Ōn which is of·sun city

12 ¬as then °them they·¬humbled to·¬so·great ¬greater⁺ they·were·generated·themselves and they·¬were·strong ¬very ¬very and they·¬abhorred·themselves the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

13 and they·¬oppressed the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·¬force

14 and they·¬afflicted·grievously of·them °the ⁼life in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬hard⁺ to·the ⁼¬clay and to·the ⁼¬making·of·bricks and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬plains⁺ ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·which⁺ they·¬enslaved·themselves °them with of·¬force

15 and told the ⁼king of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬midwifes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ to·the ⁼one of·them to·which name Sepfōra and the ⁼name of·the ⁼second Foua

16 and told ¬when you⁺·¬act·as·midwife·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼Hebraics⁺ and they·should·be unto to·the·one to·¬give·birth·to ifᵮ ¬on·the·other·hand virulent should·be ꜝkill·off⁺ °it ifᵮ then suckler ꜝ¬gain⁺·yourselves⁺ °it

17 they·were·¬feared then the⁺ ⁼¬midwifes⁺ °the ⁼God and not they·did ¬as ¬directed to·them the ⁼king of·Egypt and they·¬gave·life °the⁺ ⁼virulent⁺

18 called then the ⁼king of·Egypt °the⁺ ⁼¬midwifes⁺ and told to·them °what ¬that you⁺·did °the ⁼¬thing ⁼this and you⁺·¬gave·life °the⁺ ⁼virulent⁺

19 they·told then the⁺ ⁼¬midwifes⁺ to·the ⁼Pharaoh not as women⁺ of·Egypt the⁺ ⁼Hebraics⁺ they·¬give·birth·to for ¬before or to·come·to unto °them ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬midwifes⁺ and they·¬gave·birth·to

20 ¬well then did the ⁼God to·the⁺ ⁼¬midwifes⁺ and ¬multiplied the ⁼people and ¬was·strong ¬very

21 ¬since they·¬feared·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬midwifes⁺ °the ⁼God they·did to·¬selves⁺ °houses⁺

22 ¬directed then Pharaoh to·all ⁼the ⁼people of·him saying ⁼all °virulent which ifᵮ should·be·¬given·birth·to to·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ to °the ⁼¬river ꜝ¬throw⁺ and °all ⁼suckler you⁺·¬give·life °it

2 was then whatever out of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Levi which took of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·¬Levi and had °her

2 and in to·¬belly took and ¬gave·birth·to °virulent ¬seeing then °it ⁼¬beautiful they·¬sheltered °it °months⁺ ⁼three⁺

3 ¬since then not they·were·able·themselves °it ¬still to·¬hide took to·it the ⁼mother of·it °¬wicker·basket and ¬besmeared °her to·¬tar and threw·in °the ⁼¬child to °her and ¬placed °her to °the ⁼¬marsh ¬from °the ⁼¬river

4 and ¬spied the ⁼sister of·him ¬from·afar to·study °what ⁼the ⁼going·to·self-¬get·out to·it

5 ¬came then the ⁼daughter of·Pharaoh to·self-¬wash upon °the ⁼¬river and the⁺ ⁼¬handmaiden⁺ of·her they·¬passed·by·themselves ¬from °the ⁼¬river and ¬seeing °the ⁼¬wicker·basket in to·the ⁼¬marsh missioning·off °the ⁼¬handmaiden ¬killed·himself °her

6 ¬opening then ¬sees °¬child ⁼¬weeping in to·the ⁼¬wicker·basket and ¬spared·himself of·it the ⁼daughter of·Pharaoh and ¬asserted off of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ °this

7 and told the ⁼sister of·it to·the ⁼daughter of·Pharaoh you·¬will I·should·call to·you °woman ⁼¬nourishing out of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ and will·suckle to·you °the ⁼¬child

8 the·one then told to·her the ⁼daughter of·Pharaoh ꜝ¬travel·yourself coming then the ⁼¬young·woman called °the ⁼mother of·the ⁼¬child

9 told then unto °her the ⁼daughter of·Pharaoh ꜝ¬keep to·me °the ⁼¬child ⁼this and ꜝsuckle to·me °it I* then I·will·give to·you °the ⁼¬wage took then the ⁼woman °the ⁼¬child and suckled °it

10 of·¬matured then of·the ⁼¬child ¬brought·in °it unto °the ⁼daughter of·Pharaoh and was·been·generated to·her to °son ¬named then °the ⁼name of·him °Mosheh saying out of·the ⁼water °him I·¬killed·myself

11 was·generated·himself then in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼those⁺ great ⁼self-generated ⁼Mosheh came·out unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬observing then °the ⁼¬travail of·them ¬sees °human ⁼Egyptian ⁼¬striking ⁼whatever ⁼¬Hebrew of·the·ones⁺ of·himself of·brothers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

12 self-¬looking·around then ¬here and ¬here not ¬sees °no·one and ¬striking °the ⁼Egyptian ¬hid °him in to·the ⁼¬sand

13 coming·out then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼second ¬sees two °men⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ ⁼self-¬skirmishing and says to·the ⁼¬harming through °what you you·¬strike °the ⁼¬neighbor

14 the·one then told what °you ¬appointed °¬ruler and °¬magistrate upon of·us ńot to·¬kill °me you you·¬will °which ⁼¬way you·¬killed ¬yesterday °the ⁼Egyptian was·¬feared then Mosheh and told if thus ¬revealed has·been·generated the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this

15 heard then Pharaoh °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this and ¬sought to·¬kill °Mosheh ¬left then Mosheh off of·¬face of·Pharaoh and ¬dwelled in to·earth of·¬Midian coming then to °earth of·¬Midian ¬seated upon of·the ⁼¬well

16 then to·the ⁼priest of·¬Midian they·were seven daughters⁺ ⁼¬flocksmaning °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·the ⁼father of·them Iothor self-¬coming then they·¬drew ¬until they·¬filled °the⁺ ⁼¬troughs⁺ to·¬water °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·the ⁼father of·them Iothor

17 self-¬coming then the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ they·threw·out °them ¬arising then Mosheh ¬rescued·himself °them and ¬drew to·them and ¬watered °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·them

18 they·¬came·themselves then unto Ragouēl ⁼the ⁼father of·them the·one then told to·them °what ¬that you⁺·¬hastened of·the·one to·self-¬come today

19 the·ones⁺ then they·told human ⁼Egyptian ¬rescued·himself °us off of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ and ¬drew to·us and ¬watered °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·us

20 the·one then told to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·him and ¬where? is and so·that °what thus you⁺·have·¬left·behind °the ⁼human ꜝcall⁺ therefore °him ¬that should·¬eat °bread

21 was·¬settled then Mosheh ¬from to·the ⁼human and ¬leased·himself Sepfōran ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him to·Mosheh °woman

22 in to·¬belly then taking ⁼the ⁼woman ¬gave·birth·to °son and ¬named Mosheh °the ⁼name of·him Gērsam saying ¬that ¬foreigner I·am in to·earth ⁼¬another's

23 with then °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼those⁺ ¬deceased the ⁼king of·Egypt and they·¬groaned the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ and they·¬cried·out and ¬ascended the ⁼¬outcry of·them unto °the ⁼God off of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺

24 and ¬listened·to the ⁼God °the ⁼¬groan of·them and was·¬remembered the ⁼God of·the ⁼¬covenant of·him of·the·one unto °Abraham and °Yitzchaq and °Ya‘aqob

25 and ¬looked·upon the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and was·known to·them

3 and Mosheh was ¬flocksmaning °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ Iothor ⁼the ⁼¬in-law of·him ⁼the ⁼priest of·¬Midian and ¬brought °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ ¬by °the ⁼¬deserted and came to °the ⁼mountain Chōrēb

2 was·¬seen then to·it ¬announcer of·lord in to·¬flame of·fire out of·the ⁼¬thorn·bush and ¬sees ¬that the ⁼¬thorn·bush ¬kindles·himself to·fire then the ⁼¬thorn·bush not ¬burned·himself

3 told then Mosheh ⁼¬passing·by I·will·¬see·myself °the ⁼¬vision ⁼the ⁼great ⁼this ⁼what ¬that not ¬burns·himself the ⁼¬thorn·bush

4 as then ¬saw lord ¬that ¬brings·near to·¬see called °him lord out of·the ⁼¬thorn·bush saying Mosheh ⁼Mosheh the·one then told what is

5 and told ńot you·should·¬come·near ¬here ꜝ¬loose·yourself °the ⁼¬sandal out of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you the·one for ¬place in to·which you you·have·stood earth ⁼holy is

6 and told to·him I* I·am the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·you God of·Abraham and God of·Yitzchaq and God of·Ya‘aqob ¬turned·away then Mosheh °the ⁼¬face of·him ¬revered·himself for ¬??? ¬before of·the ⁼God

7 told then lord unto °Mosheh ¬seeing they·¬saw °the ⁼¬oppression of·the ⁼people of·me of·the·one in to·Egypt and of·the ⁼¬shouting of·them I·have·heard off of·the⁺ ⁼¬foremans⁺ I·have·¬seen for °the ⁼¬anguish of·them

8 and I·¬came to·self-¬take·out °them out of·hand of·Egyptians⁺ and to·¬lead·out °them out of·the ⁼earth ⁼that and to·¬bring·in °them to °earth ⁼good and °much to °earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey to °the ⁼¬place of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ and Chettaiōn and Amorraiōn and Ferezaiōn and Gergesaiōn and Euaiōn and Iebousaiōn

9 and now ¬¡see! ¬shouting of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬comes unto °me and I* I·have·¬seen °the ⁼¬affliction ⁼which the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ they·¬press·on °them

10 and now ¬come I·should·mission·off °you unto °Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and you·will·¬lead·out °the ⁼people of·me °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

11 and told Mosheh unto °the ⁼God what I·am ¬that I·will·¬travel·myself unto °Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and ¬that I·will·¬lead·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

12 told then the ⁼God to·Mosheh saying ¬that I·will·be·myself with of·you and this to·you the ⁼sign ¬that I* °you I·¬send·out in to·the·one to·¬lead·out °you °the ⁼people of·me out of·Egypt and you⁺·will·¬minister to·the ⁼God in to·the ⁼mountain ⁼this

13 and told Mosheh unto °the ⁼God ¬¡see! I* I·will·come·myself unto °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and I·will·¬say unto °them the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ has·missioned·off °me unto °you⁺ they·will·¬ask °me what ⁼name to·him °what I·will·¬say unto °them

14 and told the ⁼God unto °Mosheh I* I·am the ⁼being and told thus you·will·¬say to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el the ⁼being has·missioned·off °me unto °you⁺

15 and told the ⁼God ¬again unto °Mosheh thus you·will·¬say to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ God of·Abraham and God of·Yitzchaq and God of·Ya‘aqob has·missioned·off °me unto °you⁺ this of·me is name ⁼eternal and ¬memorial of·generations⁺ to·generations⁺

16 coming therefore ꜝ¬assemble °the ⁼¬council·of·elders of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ has·been·¬seen to·me God of·Abraham and God of·Yitzchaq and God of·Ya‘aqob saying to·¬oversight I·have·¬visited·myself °you⁺ and °whatever⁺ has·¬happened to·you⁺ in to·Egypt

17 and they·told I·will·¬pull·up °you⁺ out of·the ⁼¬oppression of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ to °the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ and Chettaiōn and Amorraiōn and Ferezaiōn and Gergesaiōn and Euaiōn and Iebousaiōn to °earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey

18 and they·will·¬listen·to·themselves of·you of·the ⁼voice and you·will·come·to·yourself you and the ⁼¬council·of·elders of·Yisra’el unto °Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and you·will·¬say unto °him the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ has·¬called·to·himself °us we·should·¬travel·ourselves therefore °¬road of·three⁺ ⁼days⁺ to °the ⁼¬deserted so·that we·should·¬sacrifice to·the ⁼God of·us

19 I* then I·have·¬seen ¬that not will·¬let·go·himself °you⁺ Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt to·be·¬travelled ifᵮ ńot with of·hand ⁼¬mighty

20 and ¬stretching·out °the ⁼hand I·will·¬strike °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·me to·which⁺ I·should·do in to·them and with °these⁺ will·¬send·out °you⁺

21 and I·will·give °¬grace to·the ⁼people ⁼this ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬when then you⁺·should·¬run·from not you⁺·will·come·off·yourselves⁺ ¬empty⁺

22 will·¬ask woman ¬from of·¬neighbor and of·¬fellow·tent-dweller of·her °¬vessels⁺ ⁼silver⁺ and °golden⁺ and °cloak and you⁺·will·¬put upon °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬despoil °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

4 was·¬answered then Mosheh and told ifᵮ therefore ńot they·should·trust to·me ńot·then they·should·¬listen·to of·the ⁼voice of·me they·will·¬say for ¬that not has·been·¬seen to·you the ⁼God °what I·will·¬say unto °them

2 told then to·him lord what ⁼this is the·one in to·the ⁼hand of·you the·one then told ¬rod

3 and told ꜝ¬throw °her upon °the ⁼earth and ¬threw °her upon °the ⁼earth and was·generated·himself ¬snake and ¬fled Mosheh off of·him

4 and told lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand and ꜝ¬catch·yourself of·the ⁼¬tail ¬stretching·out therefore °the ⁼hand ¬caught·himself of·the ⁼¬tail and was·generated·himself ¬rod in to·the ⁼hand of·him

5 so·that they·should·trust to·you ¬that has·been·¬seen to·you lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them God of·Abraham and God of·Yitzchaq and God of·Ya‘aqob

6 told then to·him lord ¬again ꜝ¬bring·in °the ⁼hand of·you to °the ⁼¬bosom of·you and ¬brought·in °the ⁼hand of·him to °the ⁼¬bosom of·him and ¬brought °the ⁼hand of·him out of·the ⁼¬bosom of·him and was·been·generated the ⁼hand of·him ¬like ¬snow

8 ifᵮ then ńot they·should·trust to·you ńot·then they·should·¬listen·to of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼sign ⁼the ⁼first they·will·trust to·you of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼sign ⁼the ⁼¬last

9 and will·be·himself ifᵮ ńot they·should·trust to·you to·the⁺ ⁼two⁺ ⁼signs⁺ ⁼these⁺ ńot·then they·should·¬listen·to of·the ⁼voice of·you you·will·take·yourself off of·the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬river and you·will·¬pour·out upon °the ⁼¬dried·up and will·be·himself the ⁼water ⁼which ifᵮ you·should·take off of·the ⁼¬river blood upon of·the ⁼¬dried·up

10 told then Mosheh unto °lord I·¬pray·myself lord not ¬sufficient I·am ¬before of·the·one ¬yesterday not·then ¬before of·the ⁼third ⁼day not·then off of·which you·¬were·first·yourself to·speak to·the ⁼¬servant of·you ¬weak·voiced and ¬slow·of·tongue I* I·am

11 told then lord unto °Mosheh what gave °mouth to·human and what did °¬hard·of·hearing and °¬deaf ⁼looking and °¬blind not I* the ⁼God

12 and now ꜝ¬travel·yourself and I* I·should·¬open °the ⁼mouth of·you and I·should·¬join·with °you which you·¬ensue to·speak

13 and told Mosheh I·¬pray·myself lord ꜝ¬appoint·yourself °self-able ⁼other ⁼which you·will·mission·off

14 and ¬angered to·¬wrath lord upon °Mosheh told not ¬¡see! Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you the ⁼¬Levite I·¬know·myself ¬that speaking will·speak he to·you and ¬¡see! he will·come·out·himself to °¬meeting to·you and ¬seeing °you will·be·¬rejoiced in to·himself

15 and you·will·¬say unto °him and you·will·give °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·me to °the ⁼mouth of·him and I* I·will·¬open °the ⁼mouth of·you and °the ⁼mouth of·him and I·will·¬join·with °you⁺ °which⁺ you⁺·will·do

16 and he to·you will·¬talk·to unto °the ⁼people and he will·be·himself of·you mouth you then to·him you·will·be·yourself the·ones⁺ unto °the ⁼God

17 and °the ⁼¬rod ⁼this ⁼the ⁼¬turned to °¬snake you·will·take·yourself in to·the ⁼hand of·you in to·which you·will·do in to·her °the⁺ ⁼signs⁺

18 was·¬travelled then Mosheh and ¬turned·away unto Iothor ⁼the ⁼¬in-law of·him and says I·will·¬travel·myself and I·will·¬turn·away unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·me °the·ones⁺ in to·Egypt and I·will·¬see·myself if ¬still they·live and told Iothor to·Mosheh ꜝ¬proceed ¬·healthy

19 with then °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼those⁺ ¬deceased the ⁼king of·Egypt told then lord unto °Mosheh in to·¬Midian ꜝ¬proceed ꜝcome·off to °Egypt they·have·died for all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬seeking of·you °the ⁼soul

20 ¬taking·up then Mosheh °the ⁼woman and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ ¬pulled·up °them upon °the⁺ ⁼¬donkeys⁺ and ¬turned to °Egypt took then Mosheh °the ⁼¬rod ⁼the·one ¬from of·the ⁼God in to·the ⁼hand of·him

21 told then lord unto °Mosheh of·self-¬travelling of·you and of·¬turning·away to °Egypt ꜝ¬see °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wonderses⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·gave in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you you·will·do °them ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh I* then I·will·¬harden °the ⁼heart of·him and not ńot should·¬send·out °the ⁼people

22 you then you·will·¬say to·the ⁼Pharaoh °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼son ⁼¬firstborn of·me of·Yisra’el

23 I·told then to·you ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me so·that to·me should·¬minister if ¬on·the·other·hand therefore ńot you·¬plan·yourself to·¬send·out °them ꜝ¬see therefore I* I·will·kill·off °the ⁼son of·you °the ⁼¬firstborn

24 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼¬road in to·the ⁼¬guest·room ¬met to·him ¬announcer of·lord and ¬sought °him to·kill·off

25 and taking Sepfōra °¬stone ¬circumcised °the ⁼¬uncircumcision of·the ⁼son of·her and ¬fell unto °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ and told stood the ⁼blood of·the ⁼¬circumcision of·the ⁼¬child of·me

26 and came·off off of·him ¬because told stood the ⁼blood of·the ⁼¬circumcision of·the ⁼¬child of·me

27 told then lord unto °Aharon ꜝbe·¬travelled to °¬meeting to·Mosheh to °the ⁼¬deserted and was·¬travelled and ¬met to·him in to·the ⁼mountain of·the ⁼God and they·¬kissed °one·another⁺

28 and ¬announced Mosheh to·the ⁼Aharon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·lord °which⁺ missioned·off and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·him

29 was·¬travelled then Mosheh and Aharon and they·¬assembled °the ⁼¬council·of·elders of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

30 and spoke Aharon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼which⁺ spoke the ⁼God unto °Mosheh and did °the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼people

31 and trusted the ⁼people and was·¬rejoiced ¬that ¬visited·himself the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ¬that ¬saw of·them °the ⁼¬pressure ¬stooping then the ⁼people ¬worshipped

5 and with °these⁺ came·to Mosheh and Aharon unto °Pharaoh and they·told to·him °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me so·that to·me they·should·¬keep·a·festival in to·the ⁼¬deserted

2 and told Pharaoh ⁼what is of·which I·will·¬listen·to·myself of·the ⁼voice of·him ¬so to·¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not I·have·¬seen °the ⁼lord and °the ⁼Yisra’el not I·¬send·out

3 and they·say to·him the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ has·¬called·to·himself °us we·will·¬travel·ourselves therefore °¬road of·three⁺ ⁼days⁺ to °the ⁼¬deserted ¬that we·should·¬sacrifice to·the ⁼God of·us ¬lest should·¬meet to·us death or murder

4 and told to·them the ⁼king of·Egypt so·that what Mosheh and Aharon you⁺·¬pervert °the ⁼people of·me off of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ꜝcome·off⁺ ¬each of·you⁺ unto °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him

5 and told Pharaoh ¬¡see! now ¬is·numerous the ⁼people ńot therefore we·should·¬keep·from °them off of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺

6 ¬directed then Pharaoh to·the⁺ ⁼¬foremans⁺ of·the ⁼people and to·the⁺ ⁼writers⁺ saying

7 ¬not·any·more will·be·¬added to·give °¬chaff to·the ⁼people to °the ⁼¬brickmaking ¬just·as ¬yesterday and °third ⁼day they ꜝlet·them·¬travel⁺·themselves and ꜝlet·them·¬assemble⁺ to·¬selves⁺ °¬chaffs⁺

8 and °the ⁼¬rate of·the ⁼¬making·of·bricks ⁼which they they·do ¬according·to °¬each ⁼day you·will·¬put·on to·them not you·will·¬remove °no·one they·¬are·devoted for through °this they·have·¬cried saying we·should·be·¬travelled and we·should·¬sacrifice to·the ⁼God of·us

9 ꜝlet·¬weigh·down·himself °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺ and ꜝlet·them·¬worry⁺ °these⁺ and ńot ꜝlet·them·¬worry⁺ in to·sayings⁺ ⁼¬empty⁺

10 they·¬hastened then °them the⁺ ⁼¬foremans⁺ and the⁺ ⁼writers⁺ and they·said unto °the ⁼people saying °¬these⁺ says Pharaoh ¬not·any·more I·give to·you⁺ °¬chaffs⁺

11 they you⁺ self-¬travelling you⁺·¬collect to·¬selves⁺ °¬chaffs⁺ ¬whence ifᵮ you⁺·should·find not for ¬removes·himself off of·the ⁼¬rate of·you⁺ °no·one

12 and was·¬scattered the ⁼people in to·¬all ⁼Egypt to·¬assemble °¬straw to °¬chaffs⁺

13 then the⁺ ⁼¬foremans⁺ they·¬hastened °them saying ꜝ¬complete⁺ °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬·fit ¬according·to °day ¬just·as and when °the ⁼¬chaff gave·himself to·you⁺

14 and they·were·whipped the⁺ ⁼writers⁺ of·the ⁼¬gens of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el the⁺ ⁼¬appointed upon °them ¬by of·the⁺ ⁼¬masters⁺ of·the ⁼Pharaoh saying through °what not you⁺·¬completed °the⁺ ⁼¬rates⁺ of·you⁺ of·the ⁼¬making·of·bricks ¬just·as ¬yesterday and °third ⁼day and °the·one of·the·one today

15 coming·to then the⁺ ⁼writers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·¬yelled·out·against unto °Pharaoh saying so·that °what thus you·do to·the·ones⁺ to·you⁺ to·¬slaves⁺

16 °¬chaff not gives·himself to·the⁺ ⁼¬slaves⁺ of·you and °the ⁼¬brick to·us they·say to·do and ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you they·have·been·whipped you·will·¬harm therefore °the ⁼people of·you

17 and told to·them you⁺·¬are·devoted ¬idlers⁺ you⁺·are through °this you⁺·say we·should·be·¬travelled we·should·¬sacrifice to·the ⁼God of·us

18 now therefore ¬travelled ꜝwork⁺·yourselves⁺ the·one for ¬chaff not will·be·given to·you⁺ and °the ⁼¬rate of·the ⁼¬making·of·bricks you⁺·will·¬pay

19 they·¬saw then the⁺ ⁼writers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Yisra’el °¬selves⁺ in to·evil⁺ saying not you⁺·will·¬leave of·the ⁼¬making·of·bricks °the ⁼¬·fit to·the ⁼day

20 they·¬met then to·Mosheh and to·Aharon to·self-coming to °¬meeting to·them of·self-¬departing of·them off of·Pharaoh

21 and they·told to·them may·¬see the ⁼God °you⁺ and may·judge ¬that you⁺·¬abhorred °the ⁼¬aroma of·us ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him to·give °sword to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him to·kill·off °us

22 ¬turned then Mosheh unto °lord and told lord through °what you·did·evil °the ⁼people ⁼this and so·that °what you·have·missioned·off °me

23 and off of·which I·have·¬travelled·myself unto °Pharaoh to·speak upon to·the·one your to·name did·evil °the ⁼people ⁼this and not you·¬rescued·yourself °the ⁼people of·you

6 and told lord unto °Mosheh ¬already you·will·¬see·yourself °which⁺ I·will·do to·the ⁼Pharaoh in for to·hand ⁼¬mighty will·¬send·out °them and in to·arm ⁼¬high will·throw·out °them out of·the ⁼earth of·him

2 spoke then the ⁼God unto °Mosheh and told unto °him I* lord

3 and I·was·¬seen unto °Abraham and °Yitzchaq and °Ya‘aqob God ⁼being of·them and °the ⁼name of·me lord not I·¬made·clear to·them

4 and I·stood °the ⁼¬covenant of·me unto °them ¬so to·give to·them °the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ °the ⁼earth ⁼which they·have·¬been·a·stranger in to·which and they·¬were·a·stranger upon of·her

5 and I* I·¬listened·to °the ⁼¬groan of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °which the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ they·¬enslave·themselves °them and I·was·¬remembered of·the ⁼¬covenant of·you⁺

6 ꜝ¬proceed ꜝtell to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying I* lord and I·will·¬lead·out °you⁺ off of·the ⁼¬command of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and I·will·¬rescue·myself °you⁺ out of·the ⁼servitude and I·will·¬ransom·myself °you⁺ in to·arm ⁼¬high and to·judgment ⁼great

7 and I·will·take·myself to·myself °you⁺ °people to·me* and I·will·be·myself of·you⁺ God and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺ the ⁼¬leading·out °you⁺ out of·the ⁼¬tyranny of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

8 and I·will·¬bring·in °you⁺ to °the ⁼earth to °which I·¬stretched·out °the ⁼hand of·me to·give °her to·the ⁼Abraham and to·Yitzchaq and to·Ya‘aqob and I·will·give to·you⁺ °her in to·¬lot I* lord

9 spoke then Mosheh thus to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and not they·¬listened·to to·Mosheh off of·the ⁼¬faint-heartedness and off of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬hard⁺

10 told then lord unto °Mosheh saying

11 ꜝcome·to ꜝspeak to·Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt so·that should·¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·the ⁼earth of·him

12 spoke then Mosheh ¬before of·lord saying ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not they·¬listened·to of·me and ¬how?! will·¬listen·to·himself of·me Pharaoh I* then ¬unreasonable I·am

14 and these⁺ ⁼¬founders⁺ of·houses⁺ ⁼paternity⁺ of·them sons⁺ of·¬Reuben ⁼¬firstborn ⁼Yisra’el ¬Enoch and Fallous ⁼¬Hezron and Charmi this ⁼the ⁼¬kindred of·¬Reuben

7 and told lord unto °Mosheh saying ¬¡see! I·have·given °you °God to·Pharaoh and Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you will·be·himself of·you ¬prophet

2 you then you·will·speak to·him °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ to·you I·¬order·myself then the ⁼Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you will·speak unto °Pharaoh ¬so to·¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·the ⁼earth of·him

3 I* then I·will·¬harden °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and I·will·¬multiply °the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ of·me and °the⁺ ⁼¬wonderses⁺ in to·earth ⁼Egypt

4 and not will·¬listen·to·himself of·you⁺ Pharaoh and I·will·¬put·on °the ⁼hand of·me upon °Egypt and I·will·¬lead·out wiŧh to·ability of·me °the ⁼people of·me °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt wiŧh will·¬avenge to·great

5 and they·will·know·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord ⁼¬stretching·out °the ⁼hand upon °Egypt and I·will·¬lead·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·¬midst of·them

6 did then Mosheh and Aharon ¬just·as ¬ordered·himself to·them lord thus they·did

7 Mosheh then was of·years⁺ eighty Aharon then the ⁼brother of·him of·years⁺ eighty of·three⁺ ¬when spoke unto °Pharaoh

8 and told lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying

9 and ifᵮ should·speak unto °you⁺ Pharaoh ⁼saying ꜝgive⁺ to·us °sign or °¬wonders and you·will·¬say to·Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you ꜝtake °the ⁼¬rod and ꜝ¬throw °her upon °the ⁼earth ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him and will·be·himself dragon

11 ¬called·together then Pharaoh °the⁺ ⁼¬wise·mans⁺ of·Egypt and °the⁺ ⁼pharmacists⁺ and they·did and the⁺ ⁼¬enchanters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼pharmaceuticals⁺ of·them ¬likewise

12 and they·¬threw ¬each °the ⁼¬rod of·him and they·were·generated·themselves dragons⁺ and ¬swallowed the ⁼¬rod ⁼the·one of·Aharon °the·ones⁺ of·those⁺ °¬rods⁺

13 and ¬prevailed the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and not ¬listened·to of·them ¬just·as spoke to·them lord

14 told then lord unto °Mosheh has·been·¬burdened the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh of·the·one ńot to·¬send·out °the ⁼people

15 ꜝ¬proceed unto °Pharaoh °the·one ¬early ¬¡see! he ¬departs·himself upon °the ⁼water and you·will·stand·yourself ¬meeting to·him upon °the ⁼lip of·the ⁼¬river and °the ⁼¬rod ⁼the ⁼¬turned to °¬snake you·will·take·yourself in to·the ⁼hand of·you

16 and you·will·¬say unto °him lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ has·missioned·off °me unto °you saying ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me so·that to·me should·¬minister in to·the ⁼¬deserted and ¬¡see! not you·¬listened·to ¬until of·this

17 ¬these⁺ says lord in to·this you·will·know·yourself ¬that I* lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬strike to·the ⁼¬rod ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼hand of·me upon °the ⁼water ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬river and will·¬change·mind to °blood

18 and the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬river they·will·¬decease and will·¬stink the ⁼¬river and not they·will·be·able·themselves the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ to·drink water off of·the ⁼¬river

19 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝtell to·Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you ꜝtake °the ⁼¬rod of·you and ꜝ¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·you upon °the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ of·Egypt and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ of·them and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬aqueducts⁺ of·them and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬marshes⁺ of·them and upon °all °having·¬commended water of·them and will·be·himself blood and was·generated·himself blood in to·all ⁼earth of·Egypt in also to·the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼stones⁺

20 and they·did thus Mosheh and Aharon ¬just·as ¬ordered·himself to·them lord and ¬lifting·up to·the ⁼¬rod of·him ¬struck °the ⁼water ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬river ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him and ¬changed·mind all ⁼the ⁼water ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬river to °blood

23 ⁼¬turned then Pharaoh came·to to °the ⁼house of·him and not ¬knew °the ⁼¬mind of·him not·then upon to·this

25 and they·were·¬fulfilled seven days⁺ with °the·one to·¬strike °lord ⁼the ⁼¬river

8 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝtell to·Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you ꜝ¬stretch·out to·the ⁼hand °the ⁼¬rod of·you upon °the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬aqueducts⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬marshes⁺ and ꜝ¬lead °the⁺ ⁼frogs⁺

2 and ¬stretched·out Aharon °the ⁼hand upon °the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ of·Egypt and ¬led °the⁺ ⁼frogs⁺ and was·¬pulled·up the ⁼frog and ¬covered °the ⁼earth of·Egypt

16 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬rise·at·dawn °the·one ¬early and ꜝstand ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and ¬¡see! he will·come·out·himself upon °the ⁼water and you·will·¬say unto °him °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me so·that to·me they·should·¬minister in to·the ⁼¬deserted
