21 called then Pharaoh °Mosheh and °Aharon saying coming ꜝ¬sacrifice⁺ to·the ⁼God of·you⁺ in to·the ⁼earth

22 and told Mosheh not °able to·self-be·generated thus °the·ones⁺ for °¬abominations⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ we·will·¬sacrifice to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us ifᵮ for we·should·¬sacrifice °the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬in·front·of of·them we·will·be·¬stoned

23 °¬road of·three⁺ ⁼days⁺ we·will·¬travel·ourselves to °the ⁼¬deserted and we·will·¬sacrifice to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us ¬just·as told to·us

24 and told Pharaoh I* I·mission·off °you⁺ and ꜝ¬sacrifice⁺ to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺ in to·the ⁼¬deserted but not ¬far you⁺·will·¬extend to·be·¬travelled ꜝ¬pray⁺·yourselves⁺ therefore about myˊ unto °lord

25 told then Mosheh ⁼¬this I* I·will·come·out·myself off of·you and I·will·¬pray·myself unto °the ⁼God and will·come·off·himself the ⁼¬dog-fly off of·you and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·you and of·the ⁼people of·you ¬tomorrow ńot you·should·¬add ¬still Pharaoh to·¬deceive of·the·one ńot to·¬send·out °the ⁼people to·¬sacrifice to·lord

26 came·out then Mosheh off of·Pharaoh and ¬prayed·himself unto °the ⁼God

27 did then lord ¬just·as told Mosheh and ¬took·away °the ⁼¬dog-fly off of·Pharaoh and of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him and of·the ⁼people of·him and not was·¬left·behind no·one

28 and ¬weighed·down Pharaoh °the ⁼heart of·him and upon of·the ⁼¬time ⁼this and not ¬willed to·¬send·out °the ⁼people

9 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝcome·to unto °Pharaoh and you·will·¬say to·him °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me so·that to·me they·should·¬minister

2 if ¬on·the·other·hand therefore ńot you·¬plan·yourself to·¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me but ¬still you·¬have·power·over of·him

3 ¬¡see! hand of·lord ¬??? in to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·you to·the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬plains⁺ in also to·the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬donkeys⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ and to·¬oxes⁺ and to·sheep⁺ death ⁼great ¬very

4 and I·will·¬do·an·incredible·thing I* in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not will·¬decease off of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el of·sons⁺ °¬especially

5 and gave the ⁼God °¬confirmation saying in to·the·one ¬tomorrow will·do lord °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this upon of·the ⁼earth

6 and did lord °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this to·the·one ¬next·day and ¬deceased all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ off then of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not ¬deceased °no·one

7 ¬seeing then Pharaoh ¬that not ¬deceased off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °no·one was·¬weighed·down the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and not ¬sended·out °the ⁼people

8 told then lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying ꜝtake⁺ you⁺ °¬full⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·¬soot ⁼¬of·a·furnace and ꜝlet·¬strew Mosheh to °the ⁼heaven ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him

9 and ꜝlet·be·been·generated ¬dust upon °all ⁼the ⁼earth of·Egypt and will·be·himself upon °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼four-footed⁺ ¬sores⁺ ¬boils⁺ ⁼¬breaking·out in also to·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼four-footed⁺ and in to·all ⁼earth of·Egypt

10 and took °the ⁼¬soot of·the ⁼¬of·a·furnace ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and ¬strewed °her Mosheh to °the ⁼heaven and was·generated·himself ¬sores⁺ ¬boils⁺ ⁼¬breaking·out in to·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼four-footed⁺

11 and not they·were·able·themselves the⁺ ⁼pharmacists⁺ to·stand ¬in·front·of of·Mosheh through °the⁺ ⁼¬sores⁺ was·generated·himself for the⁺ ⁼¬sores⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼pharmacists⁺ and in to·all ⁼earth of·Egypt

12 ¬hardened then lord °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and not ¬listened·to of·them ¬as ¬directed lord

13 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬rise·at·dawn °the·one ¬early and ꜝstand ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and you·will·¬say unto °him °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me so·that they·should·¬minister to·me

14 in to·the·one for now to·¬time I* I·¬send·out °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬events⁺ of·me to °the ⁼heart of·you and of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·you and of·the ⁼people of·you so·that you·should·have·¬seen ¬that not is as I* other in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth

15 now for missioning·off °the ⁼hand I·will·¬strike °you and °the ⁼people of·you to·death and you·will·¬obliterate·yourself off of·the ⁼earth

16 and ¬because·of of·this you·were·¬kept so·that I·should·¬show·myself in to·you °the ⁼¬strength of·me and ¬that should·be·¬announced °the ⁼name of·me in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth

17 ¬still therefore you you·¬cause·yourself of·the ⁼people of·me of·the·one ńot to·¬send·out °them

18 ¬¡see! I* I·¬rain °this ⁼the ⁼hour ¬tomorrow °¬hail ⁼much ¬very who ⁼¬such·as·this not has·been·generated in to·Egypt off of·which ⁼day has·been·¬created ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this

19 now therefore ꜝ¬hasten to·¬assemble °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·you and °whatever⁺ to·you is in to·the ⁼¬plain all⁺ for the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ should·be·found in to·the ⁼¬plain and ńot should·come·to to °house should·¬collapse then upon °them the ⁼¬hail will·¬decease

20 the ⁼self-¬fearing °the ⁼¬declaration of·lord of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·Pharaoh ¬assembled °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·him to °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺

21 which then ńot ¬watched·out to·the ⁼¬mind to °the ⁼¬declaration of·lord ¬released °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬plains⁺

22 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·you to °the ⁼heaven and will·be·himself ¬hail upon °all ⁼earth of·Egypt upon also °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and upon °all ⁼¬crop ⁼the·one upon of·the ⁼earth

23 ¬stretched·out then Mosheh °the ⁼hand to °the ⁼heaven and lord gave °voices⁺ and °¬hail and ¬ran·across °the ⁼fire upon of·the ⁼earth and ¬rained·down lord °¬hail upon °all ⁼earth of·Egypt

24 was then the ⁼¬hail and the ⁼fire ⁼¬kindling in to·the ⁼¬hail then the ⁼¬hail ⁼much ¬very ¬very who ⁼¬such·as·this not has·been·generated in to·Egypt off of·which has·been·generated·himself upon of·her °nation

25 ¬struck then the ⁼¬hail in to·all ⁼earth of·Egypt off of·human ¬until of·¬animal and °all ⁼¬crop ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬plain ¬struck the ⁼¬hail and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬plains⁺ ¬broke the ⁼¬hail

26 ¬but in to·earth Gesem ¬whither they·were the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not was·generated·himself the ⁼¬hail

27 missioning·off then Pharaoh called °Mosheh and °Aharon and told to·them I·have·sinned °the·one now the ⁼lord ⁼just I* then and the ⁼people of·me ¬ungodly⁺

28 ꜝ¬pray⁺·yourselves⁺ therefore about myˊ unto °lord and ꜝlet·¬cease·himself of·the·one to·be·been·generated °voices⁺ of·God and °¬hail and °fire and I·will·¬send·out °you⁺ and ¬not·any·more you⁺·will·¬add·yourselves⁺ to·¬stay

29 told then to·him Mosheh as iᵮ I·should·come·out °the ⁼city I·will·¬extend °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me unto °lord and the⁺ ⁼voices⁺ they·will·¬cease·themselves and the ⁼¬hail and the ⁼¬rain not will·be·himself ¬still so·that you·should·know ¬that of·the ⁼lord the ⁼earth

30 and you and the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·you I·¬know·myself ¬that ¬not·yet you⁺·have·¬feared·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼lord

31 °the·one then linen and the ⁼¬barley was·¬struck the·one for ¬barley ⁼having·¬stood·by °the·one then linen ⁼¬conceiving

32 then the ⁼¬wheat and the ⁼¬wild·oat not was·¬struck ¬late·rain⁺ for was

33 came·out then Mosheh off of·Pharaoh ¬outside of·the ⁼city and ¬extended °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ unto °lord and the⁺ ⁼voices⁺ they·¬ceased·themselves and the ⁼¬hail and the ⁼¬rain not ¬dripped ¬still upon °the ⁼earth

34 ¬seeing then Pharaoh ¬that has·¬ceased·himself the ⁼¬rain and the ⁼¬hail and the⁺ ⁼voices⁺ ¬added·himself of·the·one to·sin and ¬weighed·down of·him °the ⁼heart and of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him

35 and was·¬hardened the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and not ¬sended·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬just·as spoke lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

10 told then lord unto °Mosheh saying ꜝcome·to unto °Pharaoh I* for I·¬hardened of·him °the ⁼heart and of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him so·that ¬next should·¬arrive °the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ ⁼these⁺ upon °them

2 ¬that you⁺·should·¬relate·fully·yourselves⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you⁺ °whatever⁺ I·have·¬mocked to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ of·me °which⁺ I·did in to·them and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* lord

3 came·to then Mosheh and Aharon ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and they·told to·him °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ ¬until of·what not you·¬plan·yourself to·be·¬caused·shame °me ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me so·that they·should·¬minister to·me

4 ifᵮ then ńot you·should·¬will you to·¬send·out °the ⁼people of·me ¬¡see! I* I·¬bring·upon °this ⁼the ⁼hour ¬tomorrow °¬locust ⁼much upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·you

5 and will·¬cover °the ⁼¬face of·the ⁼earth and not you·will·be·able·yourself to·¬perceive °the ⁼earth and will·¬devour·himself °all ⁼the ⁼¬excessive of·the ⁼earth °the ⁼¬left·behind which ¬left·behind to·you⁺ the ⁼¬hail and will·¬devour·himself °all ⁼¬wood ⁼the ⁼self-¬growing to·you⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth

6 and they·will·be·¬filled of·you the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ and the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·you and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ in to·all ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °which⁺ ¬never they·have·¬seen the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you not·then the⁺ ⁼¬forefathers⁺ of·them off of·which ⁼day they·have·been·generated upon of·the ⁼earth ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this and ¬turning·from ⁼Mosheh came·out off of·Pharaoh

7 and they·say the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·Pharaoh unto °him ¬until of·what will·be·himself this to·us ¬impediment ꜝ¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬that they·should·¬minister to·the ⁼God of·them or to·have·¬seen you·¬plan·yourself ¬that has·¬destroyed Egypt

8 and they·¬turned·away °the·one also °Mosheh and °Aharon unto °Pharaoh and told to·them ꜝ¬travel⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬minister⁺ to·the ⁼God of·you⁺ what⁺ then and what⁺ they·are the⁺ ⁼self-¬travelling

9 and says Mosheh wiŧh to·the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ and to·¬elder⁺ we·will·¬travel·ourselves wiŧh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ and to·daughters⁺ and to·sheep⁺ and to·¬oxes⁺ of·us is for ¬festival of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

10 and told unto °them ꜝlet·be thus lord with of·you⁺ ¬as I·mission·off °you⁺ ńot and °the ⁼¬accoutrements of·you⁺ ꜝ¬see⁺ ¬that ¬evil ¬sets·before·himself to·you⁺

11 ńot thus ꜝlet·them·¬travel⁺·themselves then the⁺ ⁼men⁺ and ꜝ¬minister⁺ to·the ⁼God °this for they you⁺·¬seek they·threw·out then °them off of·¬face of·Pharaoh

12 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand upon °earth of·Egypt and ꜝlet·¬ascend ¬locust upon °the ⁼earth and will·¬devour·himself °all ⁼¬crop of·the ⁼earth and °all ⁼the ⁼fruit of·the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ °which ¬left·himself the ⁼¬hail

13 and ¬lifted·up Mosheh °the ⁼¬rod to °the ⁼heaven and lord ¬brought·upon °¬wind ⁼south upon °the ⁼earth ⁼¬all ⁼the ⁼day ⁼that and °¬all ⁼the ⁼night the·one ¬early was·been·generated and the ⁼¬wind ⁼the ⁼south ¬took·up °the ⁼¬locust

14 and ¬led °her upon °all ⁼earth of·Egypt and ¬kept·from upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·Egypt much ¬very °¬before⁺ of·her not has·been·generated ¬such·as·this ⁼¬locust and with °these⁺ not will·be·himself thus

15 and ¬covered °the ⁼¬face of·the ⁼earth and was·¬destroyed the ⁼earth and ¬devoured °all ⁼¬crop of·the ⁼earth and °all ⁼the ⁼fruit of·the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ which was·¬left off of·the ⁼¬hail not was·¬left °green ⁼no·one in to·the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ and in to·all ⁼¬crop of·the ⁼¬plain in to·all ⁼earth of·Egypt

16 ¬??? then Pharaoh to·call °Mosheh and °Aharon saying I·have·sinned ¬in·front·of of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺ and to °you⁺

17 ꜝ¬wait·for⁺·yourselves⁺ therefore of·me °the ⁼sin ¬still now and you⁺·¬prayed·yourselves⁺ unto °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺ and ꜝlet·¬take·away off myˊ °the ⁼death ⁼this

18 came·out then Mosheh off of·Pharaoh and ¬prayed·himself unto °the ⁼God

19 and ¬changed·mind lord °¬wind off of·sea °¬vehement and ¬took·up °the ⁼¬locust and threw·in °her to °the ⁼¬Red·Sea ⁼sea and not was·¬left ¬locust ⁼one in to·all ⁼earth of·Egypt

20 and ¬hardened lord °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and not ¬sended·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

21 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·you to °the ⁼heaven and ꜝlet·be·been·generated ¬darkness upon °earth of·Egypt ¬tangible ⁼¬darkness

22 ¬stretched·out then Mosheh °the ⁼hand to °the ⁼heaven and was·generated·himself ¬darkness ¬darkness ¬storm upon °all ⁼earth of·Egypt °three⁺ ⁼days⁺

23 and not ¬saw no·one °the ⁼brother of·him °three⁺ ⁼days⁺ and not ¬raised·up no·one out of·the ⁼¬bed of·him °three⁺ ⁼days⁺ to·all⁺ then to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el was °light in to·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·¬occupied·themselves

24 and called Pharaoh °Mosheh and °Aharon saying ꜝ¬proceed⁺ ꜝ¬minister⁺ to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺ ¬but of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ ꜝ¬leave⁺·yourselves⁺ and the ⁼¬accoutrements of·you⁺ ꜝlet·¬run·from with of·you⁺

25 and told Mosheh but and you you·will·give to·us °¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °¬sacrifices⁺ °which⁺ we·will·do to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

26 and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·us will·¬travel·himself with of·us and not we·will·¬leave·ourselves °¬hoof off of·them for we·will·take·ourselves to·¬minister to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us we then not we·have·¬seen °what we·should·¬minister to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us ¬until of·the·one to·come °us there

27 ¬hardened then lord °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and not was·¬planed to·¬send·out °them

28 and says Pharaoh ꜝcome·off off myˊ ꜝ¬watch·out to·yourself ¬still to·¬add to·¬see of·me °the ⁼¬face to·which then iᵮ to·day you·should·be·¬seen to·me you·will·die·off·yourself

29 says then Mosheh you·have·¬said ¬not·any·more I·will·be·¬seen to·you to °¬face

11 told then lord unto °Mosheh ¬still °one ⁼¬plague I·will·¬bring·upon upon of·Pharaoh and upon °Egypt and with °these⁺ will·¬send·out °you⁺ ¬from·here ¬when then should·¬send·out °you⁺ wiŧh to·all will·throw·out °you⁺ to·¬jettisoning

2 ꜝspeak therefore ¬in·secret to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the ⁼people and ꜝlet·¬ask ¬each ¬from of·the ⁼¬neighbor and woman ¬from of·the ⁼¬neighbor °¬vessels⁺ ⁼silver⁺ and °golden⁺ and °cloak

3 lord then gave °the ⁼¬grace to·the ⁼people of·him ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and they·¬lended to·them and the ⁼human ⁼Mosheh ⁼great was·been·generated ¬very ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh and ¬in·front·of of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him

4 and told Mosheh °¬these⁺ says lord about °¬midst⁺ ⁼nights⁺ I* I·¬enter·myself to °¬midst of·Egypt

5 and will·¬decease °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·earth ⁼Egypt off of·¬firstborn ⁼Pharaoh which ¬sits·himself upon of·the ⁼throne and ¬until of·¬firstborn of·the ⁼¬female·attendant ⁼the·one ¬from °the ⁼¬millstone and ¬until of·¬firstborn of·all ⁼¬animal

6 and will·be·himself ¬shouting ⁼great ¬according·to °all ⁼earth of·Egypt who ⁼¬such·as·this not has·been·generated and ¬such·as·this ¬not·any·more will·be·¬added

7 and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not will·¬growl dog to·the ⁼tongue of·him off of·human ¬until of·¬animal ¬that you·should·have·¬seen °whatever⁺ will·¬do·an·incredible·thing lord ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and of·the ⁼Yisra’el

8 and they·will·¬come·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you these⁺ unto °me and ¬??? °me saying ꜝcome·out you and all ⁼the ⁼people of·you of·which you you·¬guide·yourself and with °these⁺ I·will·come·out·myself came·out then Mosheh off of·Pharaoh with of·¬wrath

9 told then lord unto °Mosheh not will·¬listen·to·himself of·you⁺ Pharaoh so·that ¬multiplying I·should·¬multiply of·me °the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬wonderses⁺ in to·earth ⁼Egypt

10 Mosheh then and Aharon they·did °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬wonderses⁺ ⁼these⁺ in to·earth ⁼Egypt ¬in·front·of of·Pharaoh ¬hardened then lord °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and not ¬willed to·¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

12 told then lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon in to·earth of·Egypt saying

2 ⁼the ⁼month ⁼this to·you⁺ ¬beginning of·months⁺ first is to·you⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼months⁺ of·the ⁼¬year

3 ꜝspeak unto °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying to·the ⁼tenth of·the ⁼month ⁼this ꜝlet·them·take⁺ ¬each °sheep ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternity⁺ ¬each °sheep ¬according·to °house

4 ifᵮ then ¬very·few⁺ they·should·be the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼house ¬so ńot °¬sufficient⁺ to·be to °sheep will·¬seize·himself with of·himself °the ⁼¬neighbor ⁼the ⁼¬neighbor of·him ¬according·to °¬number of·souls⁺ ¬each °the ⁼¬·sufficient to·him will·¬count·with·himself to °sheep

5 sheep ⁼¬perfect ⁼virulent ⁼¬of·a·year will·be·himself to·you⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼lambs⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼¬goats⁺ you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺

6 and will·be·himself to·you⁺ having·been·¬kept ¬until of·the ⁼four-and-tenth of·the ⁼month ⁼this and they·will·¬slaughter °it ⁼all ⁼the ⁼¬multitude of·¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el unto °¬evening

7 and they·will·take·themselves off of·the ⁼blood and they·will·¬place upon of·the·ones⁺ two of·¬doorposts⁺ and upon °the ⁼¬doorway in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ in to·which⁺ ifᵮ they·should·¬eat °them in to·them

8 and they·will·¬eat·themselves °the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ to·the ⁼night ⁼this °¬broiled⁺ to·fire and °¬unleavened⁺ upon of·¬bitter·herbs⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves

9 not you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ off of·them °shoulder not·then °having·self-¬baked in to·water but or °¬broiled⁺ to·fire °head wiŧh to·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬entrailses⁺

10 not you⁺·will·¬leave off of·him ¬until ¬early and °bone not you⁺·will·¬break off of·him then °the⁺ ⁼self-¬leaving·behind off of·him ¬until ¬early in to·fire you⁺·will·¬burn

11 thus then you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °it the⁺ ⁼¬loinses⁺ of·you⁺ having·been·¬girded and °the⁺ ⁼¬sandals⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬staffs⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °it with of·¬diligence ¬Passover·lamb is to·lord

12 and I·will·¬pass·through·myself in to·earth ⁼Egypt in to·the ⁼night ⁼this and I·will·¬strike °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·earth ⁼Egypt off of·human ¬until of·¬animal and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ I·should·do °the ⁼¬vengeance I* lord

13 and will·be·himself the ⁼blood to·you⁺ in to·sign upon of·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ in to·which⁺ you⁺ you⁺·are there and I·will·¬see·myself °the ⁼blood and I·should·¬shelter °you⁺ and not will·be·himself in to·you⁺ ¬plague of·the·one to·be·¬obliterated ¬when I·¬strike in to·earth ⁼Egypt

14 and will·be·himself the ⁼day to·you⁺ this ¬memorial and you⁺·will·¬keep·a·festival °her ⁼¬festival to·lord to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺ °law ⁼eternal you⁺·will·¬keep·a·festival °her

15 seven °days⁺ °¬unleavened⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ off then of·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼first you⁺·will·¬destroy °¬leaven out of·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺ all ⁼which iᵮ you·will·¬eat·yourself °¬leaven will·be·¬rooted·out the ⁼soul ⁼that out of·Yisra’el off of·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼first ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh

16 and the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼first will·be·called °holy⁺ and the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh ⁼¬called ⁼holy will·be·himself to·you⁺ °all ⁼work ⁼¬servile not you⁺·will·do in to·them ¬but °whatever⁺ will·be·done to·all ⁼soul °this ¬only will·be·done to·you⁺

17 and you⁺·will·¬keep·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬commandment ⁼this in for to·the ⁼day ⁼this I·will·¬lead·out °the ⁼ability of·you⁺ out of·earth ⁼Egypt and you⁺·will·do °the ⁼day ⁼this to °generations⁺ of·you⁺ °law ⁼eternal

18 of·self-¬begining to·the ⁼four-and-tenth ⁼day of·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first off of·¬evening you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °¬unleavened⁺ ¬until of·day ⁼one and of·¬twentieth·day of·the ⁼month ¬until of·¬evening

19 seven of·day ¬leaven not will·be·found in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺ all ⁼which iᵮ you·will·¬eat·yourself °¬leavened will·be·¬rooted·out the ⁼soul ⁼that out of·¬synagogue of·Yisra’el in also to·the⁺ ⁼¬foreigners⁺ and to·¬native-born⁺ of·the ⁼earth

20 °all ⁼¬leavened not you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ in to·all then to·¬dwelling·place of·you⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °¬unleavened⁺

21 called then Mosheh °all ⁼¬council·of·elders of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and told unto °them coming·off ꜝtake⁺ to·you⁺ to·¬selves⁺ °sheep ¬according·to °¬kindreds⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬sacrifice⁺ °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb

22 you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ then °¬bundle of·hyssop and baptizing off of·the ⁼blood ⁼the·one ¬from °the ⁼¬door you⁺·will·¬appoint of·the ⁼¬doorway and upon of·¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬doorposts⁺ off of·the ⁼blood which is ¬from °the ⁼¬door you⁺ then not you⁺·will·come·out·yourselves⁺ ¬each °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼house of·him ¬until ¬early

23 and will·¬pass·by·himself lord to·¬strike °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and will·¬see·himself °the ⁼blood upon of·the ⁼¬doorway and upon of·¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬doorposts⁺ and will·¬pass·by·himself lord °the ⁼¬door and not will·¬release °the ⁼¬destroying to·come·to to °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺ to·¬strike

24 and you⁺·will·¬keep·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this ⁼law to·yourself and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you ¬until of·eternity

25 ifᵮ then you⁺·should·come·to to °the ⁼earth ⁼which iᵮ should·give lord to·you⁺ ¬as spoke you⁺·will·¬keep·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬ministry ⁼this

26 and will·be·himself ifᵮ they·should·say unto °you⁺ the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺ what ⁼the ⁼¬ministry ⁼this

27 and you⁺·will·¬say to·them ¬sacrifice the ⁼¬Passover·lamb ⁼this to·lord as ¬sheltered °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el in to·Egypt ¬when ¬struck °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ then ⁼the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·us ¬rescued·himself and ¬stooping ⁼the ⁼people ¬worshipped

28 and coming·off they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬as ¬ordered·himself lord to·the ⁼Mosheh and to·Aharon thus they·did

29 was·been·generated then of·¬·in·the·middle ⁼the ⁼night and lord ¬struck °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·earth ⁼Egypt off of·¬firstborn of·Pharaoh ⁼the ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·the ⁼throne ¬until of·¬firstborn of·the ⁼¬captive ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬pit and ¬until of·¬firstborn ⁼all ⁼¬animal

30 and ¬arising ⁼Pharaoh of·night and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and was·been·generated ¬shouting ⁼great in to·all ⁼earth ⁼Egypt not for was house in to·which not was in to·her having·died

31 and called Pharaoh °Mosheh and °Aharon of·night and told to·them ꜝ¬arise⁺ and ꜝcome·out⁺ out of·the ⁼people of·me and you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el you⁺·¬proceed and ꜝ¬minister⁺ to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺ ¬as you⁺·say

32 and °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ of·you⁺ ¬taking·up ꜝ¬travel⁺·yourselves⁺ ꜝ¬praise⁺ then and °me*

33 and they·¬constrained·themselves the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °the ⁼people to·¬diligence to·throw·out °them out of·the ⁼earth they·told for ¬that all⁺ we we·die·off

34 ¬took·up then the ⁼people °the ⁼¬dough ¬before of·the·one to·be·¬leavened °the⁺ ⁼¬lumps⁺ of·them °having·self-¬bound·in in to·the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·them upon of·the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺

35 then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·did ¬as ¬directed to·them Mosheh and they·¬asked ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °¬vessels⁺ ⁼silver⁺ and °golden⁺ and °cloak

36 and lord gave °the ⁼¬grace to·the ⁼people of·him ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and they·¬lended to·them and they·¬despoiled °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

37 ¬taking·away then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out Ramessē to ¬??? to °six·hundred⁺ ⁼thousands⁺ of·¬on·foot⁺ the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ¬but of·the ⁼¬accoutrements

38 and ¬intermixed ⁼much ¬ascended·with to·them and sheep⁺ and ¬oxes⁺ and ¬animals⁺ ⁼many⁺ ¬very

39 and they·¬baked °the ⁼¬dough which they·¬brought out of·Egypt °¬cakeses⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ not for was·¬leavened they·threw·out for °them the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and not they·were·been·able to·¬remain not·then °¬food they·did to·¬selves⁺ to °the ⁼¬road

40 then the ⁼¬dwelling of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °which they·¬dwelled in to·earth ⁼Egypt and in to·earth ¬Canaan °years⁺ ⁼four·hundred⁺ thirty

41 and was·generated·himself with °the⁺ ⁼four·hundred⁺ thirty °years⁺ came·out all ⁼the ⁼ability of·lord out of·earth ⁼Egypt

42 ⁼night ¬advance·guard is to·the ⁼lord ¬so to·¬lead·out °them out of·earth ⁼Egypt that ⁼the ⁼night ⁼this ⁼¬advance·guard to·lord ¬so to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·be to °generations⁺ of·them

43 told then lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying ⁼this ⁼the ⁼law of·the ⁼¬Passover·lamb all ⁼¬foreign not will·¬eat·himself off of·it

44 and °all ⁼¬slave of·whatever or °¬bought·with·silver you·will·¬circumcise °him and ŧhen will·¬eat·himself off of·it

45 ¬foreigner or ¬hired·worker not will·¬eat·himself off of·it

46 in to·house ⁼one will·be·¬eaten and not you⁺·will·¬bring out of·the ⁼house of·the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ out and °bone not you⁺·will·¬break off of·it

47 all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el will·do °it

48 ifᵮ then whatever should·come·unto unto °you⁺ ¬proselyte to·do °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb to·lord you·will·¬circumcise of·him °all ⁼¬male and ŧhen will·come·unto·himself to·do °it and will·be·himself ¬just·as and the ⁼¬native-born of·the ⁼earth all ⁼¬uncircumcised not will·¬eat·himself off of·him

49 law ⁼one will·be·himself to·the ⁼¬native·inhabitant and to·the ⁼coming·unto ⁼¬proselyte in to·you⁺

50 and they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬as ¬ordered·himself lord to·the ⁼Mosheh and to·Aharon unto °them thus they·did

51 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼day ⁼that ¬led·out lord °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt wiŧh to·ability of·them

13 told then lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝmake·holy to·me °all ⁼¬firstborn ⁼¬first-born ⁼¬opening·up °all ⁼motherhood in to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·human ¬until of·¬animal to·me* is

3 told then Mosheh unto °the ⁼people ꜝ¬remember⁺ °the ⁼day ⁼this in to·which you⁺·came·out out of·earth ⁼Egypt out of·house of·servitude in for to·hand ⁼¬mighty ¬led·out °you⁺ lord ¬from·here and not will·be·¬eaten ¬leaven

4 in for to·the·one today you⁺ you⁺·¬depart·yourselves⁺ in to·month of·the⁺ ⁼young⁺

5 and will·be·himself ¬when ifᵮ should·¬bring·in °you lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you to °the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ and Chettaiōn and Euaiōn and Gergesaiōn and Amorraiōn and Ferezaiōn and Iebousaiōn °which ¬swore to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you to·give to·you °earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey and you·will·do °the ⁼¬ministry ⁼this in to·the ⁼month ⁼this

6 six °days⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °¬unleavened⁺ then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh ¬festival of·lord

7 °¬unleavened⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °the·ones⁺ seven °days⁺ not will·be·¬seen to·you ¬leavened not·then will·be·himself to·you ¬leaven in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·you

8 and you·will·¬announce to·the ⁼son of·you in to·the ⁼day ⁼that saying through °this did lord ⁼the ⁼God to·me as I·¬departed·myself out of·Egypt

9 and will·be·himself to·you sign upon of·the ⁼hand of·you and ¬memorial ¬before of·¬eyes⁺ of·you ¬that iᵮ should·be·generated·himself the ⁼law of·lord in to·the ⁼mouth of·you in for to·hand ⁼¬mighty ¬led·out °you lord ⁼the ⁼God out of·Egypt

10 and you⁺·will·¬keep·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼law ⁼this ¬according·to °¬times⁺ of·hours⁺ off of·days⁺ to °days⁺

11 and will·be·himself as iᵮ should·¬bring·in °you lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you to °the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ °which ⁼¬way ¬swore to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you and will·give to·you °her

12 and you·will·¬remove °all ⁼¬opening·up °motherhood °the⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ to·the ⁼lord °all ⁼¬opening·up °motherhood out of·the⁺ ⁼¬herds⁺ or in to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·you °whatever⁺ ifᵮ should·be·generated·himself to·you °the⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ you·will·make·holy to·the ⁼lord

13 °all ⁼¬opening·up °motherhood of·donkey you·will·¬change to·sheep ifᵮ then ńot you·should·¬change you·will·¬ransom·yourself °it ⁼all ⁼¬firstborn of·human of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you you·will·¬ransom·yourself

14 ifᵮ then should·¬ask °you the ⁼son of·you with °these⁺ saying what ⁼this and you·will·¬say to·him ¬that in to·hand ⁼¬mighty ¬led·out °us lord out of·earth ⁼Egypt out of·house of·servitude

15 ¬when then ¬hardened Pharaoh to·¬send·out °us killed·off °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·earth ⁼Egypt off of·¬firstborn⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬until of·¬firstborn⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ through °this I* I·¬sacrifice to·the ⁼lord °all ⁼¬opening·up °motherhood °the⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ and °all ⁼¬firstborn of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·me I·will·¬ransom·myself

16 and will·be·himself to °sign upon of·the ⁼hand of·you and °¬unshakable ¬before of·¬eyes⁺ of·you in for to·hand ⁼¬mighty ¬led·out °you lord out of·Egypt

17 as then ¬sended·out Pharaoh °the ⁼people not ¬guided °them the ⁼God °¬road of·earth Fulistiim ¬that ¬near was told for the ⁼God ¬lest should·¬repent to·the ⁼people ⁼¬seeing °war and should·¬turn·away to °Egypt

18 and ¬surrounded the ⁼God °the ⁼people °¬road ⁼the·one to °the ⁼¬deserted to °the ⁼¬Red·Sea ⁼sea fifth then generation they·¬ascended the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

19 and took Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·Yosef with of·himself to·¬oath for ¬adjured Yosef °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying to·¬oversight will·¬visit·himself °you⁺ lord and you⁺·will·¬join·in·carrying·off of·me °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ¬from·here with of·you⁺

20 ¬expelling then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out Sokchōth they·¬encamped in Othom ¬from °the ⁼¬deserted

21 then the ⁼God ¬governed·himself of·them of·day ¬on·the·other·hand in to·pillar of·cloud to·¬show to·them °the ⁼¬road then ⁼the ⁼night in to·pillar of·fire

22 not ¬failed the ⁼pillar of·the ⁼cloud ⁼day and the ⁼pillar of·the ⁼fire of·night ¬in·front·of of·all ⁼the ⁼people

14 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ¬turning·away ꜝlet·them·¬encamp⁺ ¬opposite of·the ⁼¬residence ¬each °¬midst Magdōlou and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼sea out of·¬hostile Beelsepfōn ¬before of·them you·will·¬encamp upon of·the ⁼sea

3 and will·¬say Pharaoh to·the ⁼people of·him the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·¬lead·astray·themselves these⁺ in to·the ⁼earth has·¬confined for °them the ⁼¬deserted

4 I* then I·will·¬harden °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and will·¬seek·himself ¬after of·them and I·will·be·¬been·glorified in to·Pharaoh and in to·all ⁼the ⁼¬army of·him and they·will·know·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord and they·did thus

5 and was·¬announced to·the ⁼king of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬that has·¬fled the ⁼people and was·¬changed the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him upon °the ⁼people and they·told what ⁼this we·did of·the·one to·¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ⁼the·one ńot to·serve to·us

6 ¬harnessed therefore Pharaoh °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·him and °all ⁼the ⁼people of·him ¬led·away·with with of·himself

7 and taking °six·hundred⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ and °all ⁼the ⁼horse of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and °¬tribunes⁺ upon of·all⁺

8 and ¬hardened lord °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him and ¬sought ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ ⁼Yisra’els⁺ then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’els⁺ they·¬departed·themselves in to·hand ⁼¬high

9 and they·¬sought the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬after of·them and they·found °them ⁼having·¬inserted·against ¬from °the ⁼sea and all ⁼the ⁼horse and the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·Pharaoh and the⁺ ⁼horsemen⁺ and the ⁼¬army of·him ¬opposite of·the ⁼¬residence out of·¬hostile Beelsepfōn

10 and Pharaoh ¬brought·near and ¬looking·up ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ they·¬see and the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ they·¬encamped ¬after of·them and they·were·¬feared ¬very they·¬cried·out then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el unto °lord

11 and told unto °Mosheh ¬from °the·one ńot to·¬be·already °¬tombs⁺ in to·earth ⁼Egypt you·¬led·out °us to·put·to·death in to·the ⁼¬deserted what ⁼this you·did to·us ¬leading·out out of·Egypt

12 not this was the ⁼¬declaration °which we·spoke unto °you in to·Egypt saying ꜝ¬neglect °us ¬that we·should·serve to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °¬greater for °us to·serve to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ or to·die·off in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this

13 told then Mosheh unto °the ⁼people ꜝ¬take·heart⁺ ꜝstand⁺ and ꜝ¬see⁺ °the ⁼¬salvation ⁼the·one ¬from of·the ⁼God °which will·do to·us today °which ⁼¬way for you⁺·have·¬seen °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ today not you⁺·will·¬add·yourselves⁺ ¬still to·¬see °them to °the ⁼eternity ⁼¬time

14 lord will·war about of·you⁺ and you⁺ you⁺·will·¬be·silent

15 told then lord unto °Mosheh °what you·¬cry·out unto °me ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ꜝlet·them·¬break·camp⁺

16 and you ꜝ¬lift·up to·the ⁼¬rod of·you and ꜝ¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·you upon °the ⁼sea and ꜝ¬throw·violently °her and ꜝlet·them·come·to⁺ the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °¬midst of·the ⁼sea ¬according·to °the ⁼¬dried·up

17 and ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬harden °the ⁼heart of·Pharaoh and of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ⁼all⁺ and they·will·come·to·themselves ¬after of·them and I·will·be·¬been·glorified in to·Pharaoh and in to·all ⁼the ⁼¬army of·him and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ of·him

18 and they·will·know·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord of·self-¬·glorified of·me in to·Pharaoh and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ and to·horses⁺ of·him

19 ¬expelled then the ⁼¬announcer of·the ⁼God the ⁼self-¬going·before of·the ⁼¬barracks of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and was·¬travelled out of·the·ones⁺ ¬after ¬expelled then and the ⁼pillar of·the ⁼cloud off of·¬face of·them and stood out of·the·ones⁺ ¬after of·them

20 and came·to ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼¬barracks of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼¬barracks of·Yisra’el and stood and was·generated·himself ¬darkness and ¬darkness and ¬passed·through the ⁼night and not they·¬mixed·together·with to·one·another⁺ °¬all ⁼the ⁼night

21 ¬stretched·out then Mosheh °the ⁼hand upon °the ⁼sea and ¬went lord °the ⁼sea in to·¬wind ⁼south ⁼¬strong °¬all ⁼the ⁼night and did °the ⁼sea ⁼¬dried·up and was·¬split the ⁼water

22 and they·came·to the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °¬midst of·the ⁼sea ¬according·to °the ⁼¬dried·up and the ⁼water to·them wall out of·¬right⁺ and wall out of·¬left⁺

23 they·¬sought then the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and they·came·to ¬after of·them all ⁼the ⁼horse of·Pharaoh and °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬riders⁺ to °¬midst of·the ⁼sea

24 was·been·generated then in to·the ⁼¬prison ⁼the ⁼¬early··morning and ¬looked·upon lord upon °the ⁼¬barracks of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ in to·pillar of·fire and of·cloud and ¬disturbed °the ⁼¬barracks of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

25 and ¬bound·with °the⁺ ⁼¬axles⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·them and ¬brought °them with of·¬force and they·told the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ we·should·¬flee off of·¬face of·Yisra’el the·one for lord wars about of·them °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

26 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·you upon °the ⁼sea and ꜝlet·¬restore the ⁼water and ꜝlet·¬cover °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ upon also °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬riders⁺

27 ¬stretched·out then Mosheh °the ⁼hand upon °the ⁼sea and ¬restored the ⁼water unto °day upon of·¬country then the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ they·¬fled ¬by °the ⁼water and ¬shook·out lord °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °¬midst of·the ⁼sea

28 and ¬returned ⁼the ⁼water ¬covered °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬riders⁺ and °all ⁼the ⁼ability of·Pharaoh °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬entered ¬after of·them to °the ⁼sea and not was·¬left·behind out of·them not·then one

29 then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·were·¬travelled through of·¬dried·up in to·¬midst of·the ⁼sea then the ⁼water to·them wall out of·¬right⁺ and wall out of·¬left⁺

30 and ¬rescued·himself lord °the ⁼Yisra’el in to·the ⁼day ⁼that out of·hand of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and ¬saw Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ⁼having·died ¬from °the ⁼lip of·the ⁼sea

31 ¬saw then Yisra’el °the ⁼hand ⁼the ⁼great °which⁺ did lord to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ was·¬feared then the ⁼people °the ⁼lord and they·trusted to·the ⁼God and to·Mosheh ⁼the ⁼¬servant of·him

15 ŧhen ¬sang Mosheh and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬song ⁼this to·the ⁼God and they·told saying we·should·¬sing to·the ⁼lord ¬gloriously for has·¬glorified·himself °horse and °¬rider ¬threw to °sea

2 ¬helper and ¬shelterer was·generated·himself to·me to °¬salvation this of·me God and I·will·¬glorify °him God of·the ⁼father of·me and I·will·¬lift·up °him

3 lord ⁼¬breaking °wars⁺ lord name to·him

4 °¬chariots⁺ of·Pharaoh and °the ⁼ability of·him ¬threw to °sea °¬chosen⁺ ⁼¬riders⁺ ⁼¬tribunes⁺ ¬sank in to·¬Red·Sea ⁼sea

5 to·¬Pontus ¬covered °them they·¬descended·into to °¬deep ¬like stone

6 the ⁼¬right of·you lord has·¬glorified·himself in to·¬strength the ⁼¬right of·you hand lord ¬crushed °¬enemies⁺

7 and to·the ⁼¬multitude of·the ⁼¬glory of·you you·¬broke °the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ you·missioned·off °the ⁼¬wrath of·you and ¬devoured °them as °¬straw

8 and through of·breath of·the ⁼¬wrath of·you ¬passed the ⁼water was·¬set·up ¬like wall the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ was·¬set·up the⁺ ⁼¬waves⁺ in to·¬midst of·the ⁼sea

9 told the ⁼¬enemy ⁼¬pursuing I·will·¬grasp·myself I·will·¬divide °¬plunders⁺ I·will·¬fill·up °soul of·me I·will·¬kill to·the ⁼¬sword of·me will·be·lord the ⁼hand of·me

10 you·missioned·off °the ⁼breath of·you ¬covered °them sea they·¬set ¬like ¬lead in to·water ⁼¬vehement

11 what ⁼¬like to·you in to·Gods⁺ lord what ⁼¬like to·you having·self-¬glorified in to·holy⁺ ¬marvellous in to·¬glories⁺ doing °¬wonderses⁺

12 you·¬stretched·out °the ⁼¬right of·you ¬swallowed °them earth

13 you·¬guided to·the ⁼justice of·you °the ⁼people of·you °this ⁼which you·¬ransomed·yourself you·¬pleaded to·the ⁼¬strength of·you to °¬guest·room ⁼holy of·you

14 they·heard nations⁺ and they·were·¬angered ¬labors⁺ they·took °¬dwelling Fulistiim

15 ŧhen they·¬hastened ¬rulers⁺ Edōm and ¬rulers⁺ Mōabitōn took °them ¬trembling they·¬melted all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling ¬Canaan

16 may·¬fall upon °them ¬fear and ¬trembling to·¬greatness of·arm of·you ꜝlet·them·be·¬petrified⁺ ¬until iᵮ should·¬pass·by the ⁼people of·you lord ¬until iᵮ should·¬pass·by the ⁼people of·you this °which you·¬possessed·yourself

17 ¬bringing·in ꜝ¬plant °them to °mountain of·¬inheritance of·you to °¬ready °¬dwelling·place of·you which you·¬workouted·yourself lord °¬sanctification lord which they·¬made·ready the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you

18 lord ⁼becoming·king °the ⁼eternity and upon °eternity and ¬still

19 ¬that came·to horse of·Pharaoh wiŧh to·¬chariots⁺ and to·¬riders⁺ to °sea and ¬brought·upon upon °them lord °the ⁼water of·the ⁼sea then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·were·¬travelled through of·¬dried·up in to·¬midst of·the ⁼sea

20 taking then Mariam ⁼the ⁼¬prophetess ⁼the ⁼sister of·Aharon °the ⁼¬tamborine in to·the ⁼hand of·her and they·came·out all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼women⁺ ¬after of·her with of·¬tamborines⁺ and of·choruss⁺

21 ¬originated then of·them Mariam ⁼saying we·should·¬sing to·the ⁼lord ¬gloriously for has·¬glorified·himself °horse and °¬rider ¬threw to °sea

22 ¬expelled then Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·sea ⁼¬Red·Sea and ¬brought °them to °the ⁼¬deserted Sour and they·¬travelled·themselves °three⁺ ⁼days⁺ in to·the ⁼¬deserted and not they·found °water ¬so to·drink

23 they·came then to Merra and not they·were·able·themselves to·drink out Merras °¬bitter for was through °this was·¬named the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that °¬bitterness

24 and ¬murmured the ⁼people upon °Mosheh saying °what we·will·drink·ourselves

25 ¬cried·out then Mosheh unto °lord and ¬showed to·him lord °¬wood and threw·in °it to °the ⁼water and was·¬sweetened the ⁼water there ¬placed·himself to·him °just·deeds⁺ and °judgments⁺ and there ¬tested °him

26 and told ifᵮ to·hearsay you·should·hear of·the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬pleasing⁺ ¬in·front·of of·him you·should·do and you·should·¬listen·to·yourself to·the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·him and you·should·¬keep °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ of·him °all ⁼¬illness ⁼which they·¬brought·upon to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ not I·will·¬bring·upon upon °you I* for I·am lord ⁼the ⁼self-¬healing °you

27 and they·came to Ailim and they·were there twelve ¬flows⁺ of·waters⁺ and seventy °¬sticks⁺ of·¬palms⁺ they·¬inserted·against then there ¬from °the⁺ ⁼waters⁺

16 they·¬took·away then out Ailim and they·came all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °the ⁼¬deserted Sin which is ¬each °¬midst Ailim and ¬each °¬midst ¬Sinai then to·the ⁼five-and-tenth ⁼day to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼second of·having·come·out of·them out of·earth ⁼Egypt

2 ¬murmured all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el upon °Mosheh and °Aharon

3 and they·told unto °them the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el I·wished we·died·off ¬struck ¬by of·lord in to·earth ⁼Egypt ¬when we·¬seated upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬kettles⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ and we·¬ate °breads⁺ to °¬gratification ¬that you⁺·¬led·out °us to °the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this to·kill·off °all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue ⁼this in to·¬famine

4 told then lord unto °Mosheh ¬¡see! I* I·¬rain to·you⁺ °breads⁺ out of·the ⁼heaven and will·come·out·himself the ⁼people and they·will·¬collect °the·one of·the ⁼day to °day ¬that I·should·¬test °them if they·will·¬travel·themselves to·the ⁼law of·me or not

5 and will·be·himself to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼sixth and they·will·¬make·ready which ifᵮ they·should·¬bring·in and will·be·himself °¬double which ifᵮ they·should·¬assemble °the·one ¬according·to °day to °day

6 and told Mosheh and Aharon unto °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el of·¬evening you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that lord ¬led·out °you⁺ out of·earth ⁼Egypt

7 and ¬early you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬glory of·lord in to·the·one to·¬listen·to °the ⁼¬murmuring of·you⁺ upon to·the ⁼God we then what we·are ¬that you⁺·¬murmur ¬according·to of·us

8 and told Mosheh in to·the·one to·give °lord to·you⁺ of·¬evening °meats⁺ to·¬eat and °breads⁺ °the·one ¬early to °¬gratification through °the·one to·¬listen·to °lord ⁼the ⁼¬murmuring of·you⁺ °which you⁺ you⁺·¬murmur ¬according·to of·us we then what we·are not for ¬according·to of·us the ⁼¬murmuring of·you⁺ is but or ¬according·to of·the ⁼God

9 told then Mosheh unto °Aharon ꜝtell to·all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ꜝcome·unto⁺ ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God has·¬listened·to for of·you⁺ °the ⁼¬murmuring

10 ¬when then spoke Aharon to·all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·were·¬turned to °the ⁼¬deserted and the ⁼¬glory of·lord was·¬seen in to·cloud

11 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

12 I·have·¬listened·to °the ⁼¬murmuring of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ꜝspeak unto °them saying °the·one unto °¬evening you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °meats⁺ and °the·one ¬early you⁺·will·be·¬filled of·breads⁺ and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺

13 was·generated·himself then ¬evening and ¬ascended ¬mother-quail and ¬covered °the ⁼¬barracks °the·one ¬early was·generated·himself of·self-¬keeping·from ⁼the ⁼¬dew ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬barracks

14 and ¬¡see! upon °¬face of·the ⁼¬deserted ¬coin ¬like coriander ⁼white ¬like ¬ice upon of·the ⁼earth

15 ¬seeing then °it the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·told óther to·the ⁼óther what is this not for they·had·¬seen what was told then Mosheh unto °them this ⁼the ⁼bread °which gave lord to·you⁺ to·¬eat

16 this ⁼the ⁼¬declaration °which ¬directed lord ꜝ¬assemble⁺ off of·it ¬each to °the⁺ ⁼¬·fit °¬homer ¬according·to °head ¬according·to °¬number of·souls⁺ of·you⁺ ¬each wiŧh to·the·ones⁺ ¬??? of·you⁺ ꜝ¬collect⁺

17 they·did then thus the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·¬collected the·one °the ⁼much and the·one °the ⁼¬lesser

18 and ¬measuring to·the ⁼¬homer not ¬increased the·one °the ⁼much and the·one °the ⁼¬lesser not ¬had·little ¬each to °the⁺ ⁼¬·fit ¬from to·himself they·¬collected

19 told then Mosheh unto °them ¬nothing ꜝlet·¬leave·behind off of·it to °the·one ¬early

20 and not they·¬listened·to to·Mosheh but they·¬left·behind whatever⁺ off of·it to °the·one ¬early and ¬erupted °¬worms⁺ and ¬stank and was·¬embittered upon to·them Mosheh

21 and they·¬collected °it ¬early ¬early ¬each °the ⁼¬·fit to·him ¬when then ¬warmed·through the ⁼sun ¬melted·himself

22 was·generated·himself then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼sixth they·¬collected °the⁺ ⁼¬·necessary ⁼¬double⁺ two ¬homer to·the ⁼one they·came·to then all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼¬synagogue and they·¬announced to·Mosheh

23 told then Mosheh unto °them this ⁼the ⁼¬declaration is °which spoke lord shabbats⁺ ¬rest °holy⁺ to·the ⁼lord ¬tomorrow °whatever⁺ ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬bake ꜝ¬bake⁺ and °whatever⁺ ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬bake ꜝ¬bake⁺ and °all ⁼the ⁼¬increasing ꜝ¬leave·behind⁺ °it to °¬storehouse to °the·one ¬early

24 and they·¬left·behind off of·it to °the·one ¬early ¬just·as ¬directed to·them Mosheh and not ¬stank not·then ¬worm was·generated·himself in to·him

25 told then Mosheh ꜝ¬eat⁺ today is for shabbats⁺ today to·the ⁼lord not will·be·found in to·the ⁼¬plain

26 six °days⁺ you⁺·will·¬collect then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh shabbats⁺ ¬that not will·be·himself in to·her

27 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh they·came·out whatever⁺ out of·the ⁼people to·¬collect and not they·found

28 told then lord unto °Mosheh ¬until of·what not you⁺·¬plan·yourselves⁺ to·¬listen·to °the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·me and °the ⁼law of·me

29 ꜝ¬see⁺ the·one for lord gave to·you⁺ °the ⁼day ⁼this °the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ through °this he gave to·you⁺ to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼sixth °breads⁺ two of·days⁺ you⁺·will·¬sit·yourselves⁺ ¬each to °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺ ¬nothing ꜝlet·¬depart·himself out of·the ⁼¬place of·him to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh

30 and ¬observed·sabbaths the ⁼people to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh

31 and they·¬named the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼name of·it °manna was then as seed of·coriander white then ⁼the ⁼¬taste of·it as ¬pastry in to·honey

32 told then Mosheh this ⁼the ⁼¬declaration ⁼which ¬directed lord ꜝ¬fill⁺ °the ⁼¬homer of·the ⁼manna to °¬storehouse to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺ so·that they·should·¬see °the ⁼bread ⁼which you⁺·¬ate you⁺ in to·the ⁼¬deserted as ¬led·out °you⁺ lord out of·earth ⁼Egypt

33 and told Mosheh unto °Aharon ꜝtake °¬jar ⁼golden ⁼one and ꜝthrow·in to °him °¬full ⁼the ⁼¬homer of·the ⁼manna and you·will·¬put·aside °it ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God to °¬preservation to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺

34 °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh and ¬put·aside·himself Aharon ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼witness to °¬preservation

35 then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·¬ate °the ⁼manna °years⁺ forty ¬until they·came to °earth ⁼¬world °the ⁼manna they·¬ate ¬until they·¬came·themselves to °¬part of·the ⁼¬Phoenicia

36 then the ⁼¬homer ⁼the ⁼tenth of·the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼¬measures⁺ was

17 and ¬took·away all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·the ⁼¬deserted Sin ¬according·to °¬barrackses⁺ of·them through of·¬declaration of·lord and they·¬inserted·against in Rafidin not was then water to·the ⁼people to·drink

2 and ¬reviled·himself the ⁼people unto °Mosheh saying ꜝgive to·us °water so·that we·should·drink and told to·them Mosheh °what you⁺·¬revile·yourselves⁺ to·me and °what you⁺·¬test °lord

3 thirsted then there the ⁼people to·water and ¬murmured there the ⁼people unto °Mosheh saying so·that what ⁼this you·¬pulled·up °us out of·Egypt to·kill·off °us and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·us and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ to·the ⁼thirst

4 ¬cried·out then Mosheh unto °lord saying °what I·should·do to·the ⁼people ⁼this ¬still °¬small and they·will·¬cast·a·stone·at °me

5 and told lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬go·before·yourself of·the ⁼people ⁼this ꜝtake then with of·yourself off of·the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·the ⁼people and °the ⁼¬rod in to·which you·¬struck °the ⁼¬river ꜝtake in to·the ⁼hand of·you and you·will·¬travel·yourself

6 ¬this I* I·have·stood ¬before of·the·one °you there upon of·the ⁼rock in Chōrēb and you·will·¬strike °the ⁼rock and will·come·out·himself out of·her water and will·drink·himself the ⁼people of·me did then Mosheh thus ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

7 and ¬named °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that ¬temptation and ¬reviling through °the ⁼¬reviling of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and through °the·one to·¬test °lord °saying if is lord in to·us or not

8 came then Amalēk and warred Yisra’el in Rafidin

9 told then Mosheh to·the·one of·Yesou ꜝ¬call to·yourself °men⁺ ⁼able⁺ and coming·out ꜝ¬deploy·yourself to·the Amalēk ¬tomorrow and ¬¡see! I* I·have·stood upon of·the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼¬hill and the ⁼¬rod of·the ⁼God in to·the ⁼hand of·me

10 and did Yesou ¬just·as told to·him Mosheh and coming·out ¬deployed·himself to·the Amalēk and Mosheh and Aharon and Ōr they·¬ascended upon °the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼¬hill

11 and was·generated·himself ¬when ¬lifted·up Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ ¬prevailed Yisra’el ¬when then ¬lowered °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ ¬prevailed Amalēk

12 then the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·Mosheh ¬weighty⁺ and taking °stone they·¬layed ¬by °him and ¬sat·himself upon of·him and Aharon and Ōr they·¬established °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him ¬from·here one and ¬from·here one and they·were·generated·themselves the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·Mosheh having·self-¬established ¬until of·wests⁺ of·sun

13 and ¬routed·himself Yesou °the Amalēk and °all ⁼the ⁼people of·him in to·murder of·¬sword

14 told then lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬break °this to °¬memorial in to·¬scroll and ꜝgive to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ to·Yesou ¬that to·¬ointment I·will·¬blot·out °the ⁼¬memorial Amalēk out of·the·one ¬by °the ⁼heaven

15 and ¬built Mosheh °¬altar to·lord and ¬named °the ⁼name of·it lord of·me ¬refuge

16 ¬that in to·hand ⁼¬hidden wars lord upon Amalēk off of·generations⁺ to °generations⁺

18 heard then Iothor ⁼the ⁼priest of·¬Midian the ⁼¬in-law of·Mosheh °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ did lord to·Yisra’el ⁼the·one of·himself to·people ¬led·out for lord °the ⁼Yisra’el out of·Egypt

2 took then Iothor ⁼the ⁼¬in-law of·Mosheh Sepfōran ⁼the ⁼woman of·Mosheh with °the ⁼¬forgiveness of·her

3 and °the·ones⁺ two °sons⁺ of·him °name to·the ⁼one of·them Gērsam saying ⁼¬foreigner I·was·myself in to·earth ⁼¬another's

4 and °the ⁼name of·the ⁼second °¬Eliezer saying ⁼the·one for God of·the ⁼father of·me ¬helper of·me and ¬took·out·himself °me out of·hand of·Pharaoh

5 and came·out Iothor ⁼the ⁼¬in-law of·Mosheh and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ and the ⁼woman unto °Mosheh to °the ⁼¬deserted ¬whither ¬inserted·against upon of·mountain of·the ⁼God

6 was·¬announced then to·Mosheh saying ¬¡see! the ⁼¬in-law of·you Iothor ¬comes·himself unto °you and the ⁼woman and the·ones⁺ two sons⁺ of·you with of·him

7 came·out then Mosheh to °¬meeting to·the ⁼¬in-law of·him and ¬worshipped to·him and ¬befriended °him and they·¬payed·respects·to·themselves °one·another⁺ and ¬brought·in °him to °the ⁼¬tent

8 and ¬related·fully·himself Mosheh to·the ⁼¬in-law °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ did lord to·the ⁼Pharaoh and to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬because·of of·the ⁼Yisra’el and °all ⁼the ⁼¬toil ⁼the ⁼self-generated to·them in to·the ⁼¬road and ¬that ¬took·out·himself °them lord out of·hand of·Pharaoh and out of·hand of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

9 ¬amazed then Iothor upon to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼which⁺ did to·them lord ¬that ¬took·out·himself °them out of·hand of·Egyptians⁺ and out of·hand of·Pharaoh

10 and told Iothor ⁼¬praiseworthy ⁼lord ¬that ¬took·out·himself °the ⁼people of·him out of·hand of·Egyptians⁺ and out of·hand of·Pharaoh

11 now I·knew ¬that great ⁼lord ¬from °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ ¬because·of of·this ¬that they·¬put·themselves to·them

12 and took Iothor ⁼the ⁼¬in-law of·Mosheh °¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °¬sacrifices⁺ to·the ⁼God ¬came·himself then Aharon and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·Yisra’el to·¬eat·with °bread with of·the ⁼¬in-law ⁼Mosheh ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God

13 and was·generated·himself with °the·one ¬next·day ¬sat·down·with Mosheh to·judge °the ⁼people had·¬stood·by then all ⁼the ⁼people to·Mosheh off ¬from·morning ¬until of·¬evening

14 and ¬seeing Iothor °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ did to·the ⁼people says what ⁼this ⁼which you you·do to·the ⁼people through °what you you·¬sit·yourself ¬alone ⁼all then the ⁼people has·¬stood·by to·you off ¬from·morning ¬until of·¬timid

15 and says Mosheh to·the ⁼¬in-law ¬that ¬comes·himself unto °me the ⁼people to·¬seek·out °judgment ¬from of·the ⁼God

16 ¬when for should·be·generated·himself to·them ¬dispute and they·should·come unto °me I·¬judge °¬each and I·¬join·with °them °the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·the ⁼God and °the ⁼law of·him

17 told then the ⁼¬in-law of·Mosheh unto °him not ¬correctly you you·do °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this

18 to·¬corruption you·will·be·¬depraved to·¬unsufferable and you and all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼this ⁼which is with of·you ¬weighty to·you the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this not you·will·be·able·yourself to·do ¬alone

19 now therefore ꜝhear of·me and I·will·¬consult to·you and will·be·himself the ⁼God with of·you ꜝbe·generated·yourself you to·the ⁼people °the·ones⁺ unto °the ⁼God and you·will·¬carry·up °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·them unto °the ⁼God

20 and you·will·¬testify·solemnly·yourself to·them °the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·the ⁼God and °the ⁼law of·him and you·will·signify to·them °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ in to·which⁺ they·will·¬travel·themselves in to·them and °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·will·do

21 and you to·yourself ꜝ¬look·about·yourself off of·all ⁼the ⁼people °men⁺ ⁼able⁺ ⁼¬godly⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼just⁺ ⁼¬hating °¬pride and you·will·¬appoint °them upon of·them °¬military·officers⁺ and °¬centurions⁺ and °¬commander·of·fifties⁺ and °¬commander·of·tens⁺

22 and they·will·judge °the ⁼people °all ⁼hour then °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼the ⁼¬boastful they·will·¬carry·up upon °you then °the⁺ ⁼¬little⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ they·will·judge they and they·will·¬lighten off of·you and they·will·¬help·themselves to·you

23 ifᵮ °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this you·should·do will·¬prevail °you the ⁼God and you·will·be·able·yourself to·¬stand·by and all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼this to °the·one of·himself °¬place with of·peace will·¬come

24 heard then Mosheh of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬in-law and did °whatever⁺ to·him told

25 and ¬called Mosheh °men⁺ ⁼able⁺ off of·all ⁼Yisra’el and did °them upon of·them °¬military·officers⁺ and °¬centurions⁺ and °¬commander·of·fifties⁺ and °¬commander·of·tens⁺

26 and they·judged °the ⁼people °all ⁼hour °all then °¬declaration ⁼¬boastful they·¬carried·up upon °Mosheh °all then °¬declaration ⁼¬light they·judged they

27 ¬sended·out then Mosheh °the·one of·himself °¬in-law and came·off to °the ⁼earth of·him

19 then ⁼the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼third of·the ⁼¬departure of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt to·the ⁼day ⁼this they·came to °the ⁼¬deserted of·the·one ¬Sinai

2 and they·¬expelled out Rafidin and they·came to °the ⁼¬deserted of·the·one of·¬Sinai and ¬inserted·against there Yisra’el ¬before of·the ⁼mountain

3 and Mosheh ¬ascended to °the ⁼mountain of·the ⁼God and called °him the ⁼God out of·the ⁼mountain saying °¬these⁺ you·will·¬say to·the ⁼house of·Ya‘aqob and you·will·¬announce to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

4 they you⁺·have·¬seen °whatever⁺ I·have·done to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and I·¬took·up °you⁺ ¬like upon of·wings⁺ of·eagles⁺ and I·¬brought·near·myself °you⁺ unto °myself

5 and now ifᵮ to·hearsay you⁺·should·hear of·the·one myˊ of·voice and you⁺·should·¬keep °the ⁼¬covenant of·me you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me people ⁼¬special off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ myˊ for is all ⁼the ⁼earth

6 you⁺ then you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me kingly ⁼priesthood and nation ⁼holy °these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ you·will·¬say to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

7 came then Mosheh and called °the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ of·the ⁼people and ¬set·before to·them °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬directed to·him the ⁼God

8 was·¬answered then all ⁼the ⁼people ¬united and they·told °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ told the ⁼God we·will·do and we·will·hear·ourselves ¬carried·up then Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the ⁼people unto °the ⁼God

9 told then lord unto °Mosheh ¬¡see! I* I·¬come·myself unto °you in to·pillar of·cloud so·that should·hear the ⁼people of·speaking of·me unto °you and to·you they·should·trust to °the ⁼eternity ¬announced then Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·the ⁼people unto °lord

10 told then lord unto °Mosheh ¬coming ꜝ¬testify·solemnly·yourself to·the ⁼people and ꜝ¬purify °them today and ¬tomorrow and ꜝlet·them·¬wash⁺ °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺

11 and ꜝlet·them·be⁺ ¬ready⁺ to °the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third to·the·one for to·day ⁼the ⁼third will·¬come·himself lord upon °the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one ¬Sinai ¬in·front·of of·all ⁼the ⁼people

12 and you·will·¬separate °the ⁼people ¬surrounding saying ꜝ¬watch·out⁺ to·¬selves⁺ of·the·one to·¬ascend to °the ⁼mountain and to·¬touch °whatever of·it all ⁼the ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼mountain to·death will·¬decease

13 not will·touch·himself of·it hand in for to·stones⁺ will·be·¬stoned or to·¬arrow will·be·¬shot·down ifᵮ also ¬animal ifᵮ also human not will·live·himself ¬when the⁺ ⁼voices⁺ and the⁺ ⁼trumpets⁺ and the ⁼cloud should·come·off off of·the ⁼mountain those⁺ they·will·¬ascend·themselves upon °the ⁼mountain

14 ¬came then Mosheh out of·the ⁼mountain unto °the ⁼people and made·holy °them and they·¬washed °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺

15 and told to·the ⁼people ꜝbe·generated⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬ready⁺ °three⁺ ⁼days⁺ ńot you⁺·should·come·unto to·woman

16 was·generated·himself then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third of·been·generated unto °¬dawn and they·were·generated·themselves voices⁺ and ¬lightnings⁺ and cloud ⁼¬dim upon of·mountain ¬Sinai voice of·the ⁼trumpet ¬resounded °great and was·¬frightened all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬barracks

17 and ¬led·out Mosheh °the ⁼people to °¬meeting of·the ⁼God out of·the ⁼¬barracks and they·¬stood·by ¬by °the ⁼mountain

18 then the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼¬Sinai ¬smoked·himself ¬all through °the·one to·have·¬come upon °it °the ⁼God in to·fire and ¬ascended the ⁼¬smoke as ¬smoke of·¬furnace and ¬amazed all ⁼the ⁼people ¬very

19 they·were·generated·themselves then the⁺ ⁼voices⁺ of·the ⁼trumpet ¬advancing ⁼¬strong⁺ ¬very Mosheh spoke then the ⁼God ¬answered·himself to·him to·voice

20 ¬came then lord upon °the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one ¬Sinai upon °the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼mountain and called lord °Mosheh upon °the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼mountain and ¬ascended Mosheh

21 and told the ⁼God unto °Mosheh saying ⁼¬coming ꜝ¬testify·solemnly·yourself to·the ⁼people ¬lest they·should·¬come·near unto °the ⁼God to·¬observe and they·should·¬collapse out of·them ¬multitude

22 and the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬coming·near to·lord ⁼the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·be·made·holy⁺ ¬lest should·¬release off of·them lord

23 and told Mosheh unto °the ⁼God not will·be·able·himself the ⁼people to·¬go·up unto °the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one ¬Sinai you for you·have·¬testified·solemnly·yourself to·us saying ꜝ¬separate·yourself °the ⁼mountain and ꜝmake·holy·yourself °it

24 told then to·him lord ꜝ¬proceed ꜝ¬come and ꜝ¬ascend you and Aharon with of·you then the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ and the ⁼people ńot ꜝlet·them·¬force⁺·themselves to·¬ascend unto °the ⁼God ¬lest should·¬destroy off of·them lord

25 ¬came then Mosheh unto °the ⁼people and told to·them

20 and spoke lord °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ saying

2 I* I·am lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you who I·¬led·out °you out of·earth ⁼Egypt out of·house of·servitude

3 not they·will·be·themselves to·you Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ ¬but myˊ

4 not you·will·do to·yourself °idol not·then of·all °¬likeness °whatever⁺ in to·the ⁼heaven ¬above and °whatever⁺ in to·the ⁼earth ¬under and °whatever⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ ¬under of·the ⁼earth

5 not you·will·¬worship to·them not·then ńot you·should·¬minister to·them I* for I·am lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you God ⁼zealot ⁼¬paying of·sin of·fathers⁺ upon °¬children⁺ ¬until of·third and of·fourth ⁼generation to·the⁺ ⁼¬hating °me

6 and doing °mercy to °thousands⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼loving °me and to·the⁺ ⁼¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me

7 not you·will·take·yourself °the ⁼name of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you upon to·¬futile not for ńot should·¬clean lord °the ⁼taking °the ⁼name of·him upon to·¬futile

8 ꜝbe·¬remembered °the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ to·make·holy °her

9 six °days⁺ you·will·work·yourself and you·will·do °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you

10 then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh °shabbats⁺ to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you not you·will·do in to·her °all ⁼work you and the ⁼son of·you and the ⁼daughter of·you the ⁼¬child of·you and the ⁼¬maidservant of·you the ⁼¬ox of·you and the ⁼¬donkey of·you and all ⁼¬animal of·you and the ⁼¬proselyte ⁼the ⁼¬·a·stranger in to·you

11 in for six to·days⁺ did lord °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth and °the ⁼sea and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·them and ¬kept·from to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh through °this ¬praised lord °the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh and made·holy °her

12 ꜝ¬honor °the ⁼father of·you and °the ⁼mother so·that ¬well to·you should·be·generated·himself and so·that ¬long-lived you·should·be·generated·yourself upon of·the ⁼earth ⁼the ⁼good ⁼which lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you gives to·you

13 not you·will·adulterize

14 not you·will·thieve

15 not you·will·murder

16 not you·will·¬perjure ¬according·to of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·you °witness ⁼lying

17 not you·will·¬long·for °the ⁼woman of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·you not you·will·¬long·for °the ⁼house of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·you not·also °the ⁼field of·him not·also °the ⁼¬child of·him not·also °the ⁼¬maidservant of·him not·also of·the ⁼¬ox of·him not·also of·the ⁼¬donkey of·him not·also of·all ⁼¬animal of·him not·also whatever⁺ to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·you is

18 and all ⁼the ⁼people ¬saw °the ⁼voice and °the⁺ ⁼¬windows⁺ and °the ⁼voice of·the ⁼trumpet and °the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼¬smoking ¬feared then all ⁼the ⁼people they·stood ¬from·afar

19 and they·told unto °Mosheh ꜝspeak you to·us and ńot ꜝlet·speak unto °us the ⁼God ¬lest we·should·die·off

20 and says to·them Mosheh ꜝ¬take·heart⁺ ¬because·of for of·the·one to·¬test °you⁺ was·¬come the ⁼God unto °you⁺ ¬that iᵮ should·be·generated·himself the ⁼¬fear of·him in to·you⁺ so·that ńot you⁺·should·sin

21 had·stood then the ⁼people ¬from·afar Mosheh then came·to to °the ⁼¬darkness ¬whither was the ⁼God

22 told then lord unto °Mosheh °¬these⁺ you·will·¬say to·the ⁼house of·Ya‘aqob and you·will·¬announce to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el you⁺ you⁺·have·¬seen ¬that out of·the ⁼heaven I·have·spoken unto °you⁺

23 not you⁺·will·do to·¬selves⁺ °Gods⁺ ⁼silver⁺ and °Gods⁺ ⁼golden⁺ not you⁺·will·do to·you⁺ to·them

24 °¬altar out of·earth you⁺·will·do to·me and you⁺·will·¬sacrifice upon of·him °the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬savings⁺ of·you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼calves⁺ of·you⁺ in to·all ⁼¬place ¬whither ifᵮ I·should·¬name °the ⁼name of·me there and I·will·¬come unto °you and I·will·¬praise °you

25 ifᵮ then °¬altar out of·stones⁺ you·should·do to·me not you·will·¬build °them ¬??? °the·one for °¬knife of·you you·have·¬put·on upon °them and has·¬stained·himself

26 not you·will·¬ascend·yourself in to·¬stairses⁺ upon °the ⁼¬altar of·me ¬that iᵮ ńot you·should·¬reveal °the ⁼¬indecency of·you upon of·it

21 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ °which⁺ you·will·¬set·before ¬before of·them

2 ifᵮ you·should·¬possess·yourself °¬child ⁼¬Hebrew six °years⁺ will·serve to·you to·the·one then to·seventh ⁼year will·come·off·himself ¬free ¬freely

3 ifᵮ he ⁼¬alone should·come·to and ¬alone will·come·out·himself ifᵮ then woman should·¬enter·with with of·him will·come·out·himself and the ⁼woman with of·him

4 ifᵮ then the ⁼lord should·give to·him °woman and should·¬give·birth·to to·him °sons⁺ or °daughters⁺ the ⁼woman and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ will·be·himself to·the ⁼lord of·him he then ¬alone will·come·out·himself

5 ifᵮ then ¬answered should·tell the ⁼¬child I·have·loved °the ⁼lord of·me and °the ⁼woman and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ not I·¬run·from ¬free

6 will·¬bring·near °him the ⁼lord of·him unto °the ⁼judgmentplace of·the ⁼God and ŧhen will·¬bring·near °him upon °the ⁼¬door upon °the ⁼¬doorpost and will·¬make·a·hole of·him the ⁼lord °the ⁼ear to·the ⁼¬shoemaker's·awl and will·serve to·him to °the ⁼eternity

8 ifᵮ ńot should·¬please to·the ⁼lord of·her °which to·¬self ¬promised·himself will·¬redeem °her to·nation then to·¬another's not lord is to·¬sell °her ¬that ¬rejected in to·her

9 ifᵮ then to·the ⁼son should·¬promise·himself °her ¬according·to °the ⁼just·deed of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ will·do to·her

12 ifᵮ then should·¬strike what °whatever and should·die·off to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself

13 the·one then not ¬voluntarily but the ⁼God ¬delivered to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him I·will·give to·you °¬place ¬whither will·¬flee·himself there the ⁼murdering

14 ifᵮ then whatever should·¬put·himself to·the ⁼¬neighbor to·kill·off °him to·¬deceit and should·¬flee off of·the ⁼¬altar of·me you·will·take·yourself °him to·put·to·death

15 which ¬strikes °father of·him or °mother of·him to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself

16 the ⁼¬cursing °father of·him or °mother of·him will·¬decease to·death

19 ifᵮ ¬raising·up ⁼the ⁼human should·¬walk out upon of·¬rod ¬innocent will·be·himself the ⁼¬striking ¬but of·the ⁼¬idleness of·him will·¬repay and °the⁺ ⁼¬physician's·fees⁺

20 ifᵮ then whatever should·¬strike °the ⁼¬child of·him or °the ⁼¬maidservant of·him in to·¬rod and should·die·off ¬by °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him to·¬condemnation ꜝlet·be·¬avenged

21 ifᵮ then you·will·¬continue·to·live·yourself °day ⁼one or two not will·be·¬avenged the·one for silver of·him is

22 ifᵮ then they·should·¬quarrel·themselves two men⁺ and they·should·¬strike °woman in to·¬belly °having and should·come·out the ⁼¬child of·her ńot having·been·¬completelied·form °¬fine will·be·¬lost ¬as iᵮ should·¬put·on the ⁼man of·the ⁼woman will·give with of·¬petition

28 ifᵮ then should·¬butt ¬bull °man or °woman and should·die·off to·stones⁺ will·be·¬stoned the ⁼¬bull and not will·be·¬eaten the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ of·him then the ⁼lord of·the ⁼¬bull ¬innocent will·be·himself

29 ifᵮ then the ⁼¬bull ⁼¬goring should·be ¬before of·the·one ¬yesterday and ¬before of·the ⁼third and they·should·¬testify·solemnly·themselves to·the ⁼lord of·him and ńot should·¬destroy °him should·¬go·up then °man or °woman the ⁼¬bull will·be·¬stoned and the ⁼lord of·him will·¬die·in·addition·himself

30 ifᵮ then ¬ransoms⁺ should·be·¬put·on to·him will·give °¬ransoms⁺ of·the ⁼soul of·him °whatever⁺ ifᵮ they·should·¬put·on to·him
