37 ifᵮ then whatever should·thieve °calf or °sheep and should·¬slaughter °it or should·¬pay·himself five °calves⁺ will·¬repay anti of·the ⁼calf and °four⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ anti of·the ⁼sheep

22 ifᵮ then in to·the ⁼¬ditch should·be·found the ⁼thief and ¬struck should·die·off not is to·him murder

2 ifᵮ then should·¬rise the ⁼sun upon to·him ¬liable·for is will·¬die·for·himself ifᵮ then ńot should·¬be·already to·him ꜝlet·be·¬sold anti of·the ⁼thievery

3 ifᵮ then should·be·¬grasped and should·be·found in to·the ⁼hand of·him the ⁼thievery off also of·donkey ¬until of·sheep °living ⁼¬double⁺ °them will·¬repay

4 ifᵮ then should·¬graze·upon whatever °field or °vineyard and should·¬release °the ⁼¬animal of·him to·¬graze·upon °field ⁼óther will·¬repay out of·the ⁼field of·him ¬according·to °the ⁼¬offspring of·him ifᵮ then °all ⁼the ⁼field should·¬graze·upon °the⁺ ⁼¬better⁺ of·the ⁼field of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬better⁺ of·the ⁼vineyard of·him will·¬repay

5 ifᵮ then coming·out ⁼fire should·find °¬thorns⁺ and should·¬set·on·fire °¬threshing-floor or °¬head·of·grain or °¬plain will·¬repay the·one °the ⁼fire ¬·enflamed

6 ifᵮ then whatever should·give to·the ⁼¬neighbor °silver or °¬vessels⁺ to·¬keep and should·be·thieved out of·the ⁼house of·the ⁼human ifᵮ should·be·found the ⁼thieving will·¬repay °¬double

7 ifᵮ then ńot should·be·found the ⁼thieving will·come·unto·himself the ⁼lord of·the ⁼house ¬before of·the ⁼God and will·¬swear·himself or ¬certainly ńot he to·have·self-¬acted·wickedly upon of·¬all ⁼the ⁼¬deposit of·the ⁼¬neighbor

8 ¬according·to °all ⁼¬especially ⁼¬crime about also of·calf and of·¬donkey and of·sheep and of·cloak and of·all ⁼¬destruction ⁼the ⁼self-¬accusing which °whatever therefore iᵮ should·be ¬before of·the ⁼God will·come·himself the ⁼judgment of·¬both⁺ and the ⁼¬capturing through of·the ⁼God will·¬repay °¬double to·the ⁼¬neighbor

9 ifᵮ then whatever should·give to·the ⁼¬neighbor °¬donkey or °calf or °sheep or °all ⁼¬animal to·¬keep and should·be·¬broken or should·¬decease or °¬captive should·be·generated·himself and ¬nothing should·know

10 ¬oath will·be·himself of·the ⁼God ¬each °¬midst of·¬both⁺ or ¬certainly ńot °him to·have·self-¬acted·wickedly ¬according·to of·¬all ⁼the ⁼¬deposit of·the ⁼¬neighbor and thus will·¬wait·for·himself the ⁼lord of·him and not will·¬repay

11 ifᵮ then should·be·thieved ¬from of·him will·¬repay to·the ⁼lord

12 ifᵮ then ¬taken·by·wild·beasts should·be·generated·himself will·¬bring °him upon °the ⁼¬trap and not will·¬repay

13 ifᵮ then should·¬ask whatever ¬from of·the ⁼¬neighbor and should·be·¬broken or should·die·off or ¬captive should·be·generated·himself then the ⁼lord ńot should·be with of·it will·¬repay

14 ifᵮ then the ⁼lord should·be with of·it not will·¬repay ifᵮ then ¬hired·worker should·be will·be·himself to·it anti of·the ⁼¬wage of·it

15 ifᵮ then should·¬trick whatever °virgin ⁼¬not·betrothed and should·be·¬slept with of·her to·¬dowry will·¬endow °her to·him °woman

16 ifᵮ then ¬disagreing should·¬disagree and ńot should·¬plan·himself the ⁼father of·her to·give °her to·him °woman °silver will·¬repay to·the ⁼father ¬according·to °whatever is the ⁼¬dowry of·the⁺ ⁼virgins⁺

17 °pharmacists⁺ not you⁺·will·¬gain

18 all ⁼self-¬sleeping with of·¬animal to·death you⁺·will·kill·off °them

19 the ⁼¬sacrificing to·Gods⁺ to·death ¬??? ¬but to·lord ⁼¬alone

20 and °¬proselyte not you⁺·will·do·evil not·then ńot you⁺·should·¬press·on °him you⁺·were for ¬proselytes⁺ in to·earth ⁼Egypt

21 °all ⁼widow and °orphan not you⁺·will·do·evil

22 ifᵮ then to·evil you⁺·should·do·evil °them and ¬crying they·should·¬yell·out·against unto °me to·hearsay I·will·¬listen·to·myself of·the ⁼voice of·them

23 and I·will·be·¬angered to·¬wrath and I·will·kill·off °you⁺ to·¬sword and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·you⁺ widows⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you⁺ orphan⁺

24 ifᵮ then °silver you·should·¬lend·with·interest to·the ⁼brother ⁼the ⁼¬poor ¬from to·you not you·will·be·yourself °him ¬coercing not you·will·¬put to·him °¬interest

25 ifᵮ then °¬collateral you·should·¬take·for·security °the ⁼cloak of·the ⁼¬neighbor ¬before of·wests⁺ of·sun you·will·¬pay to·him

26 is for this ⁼¬covering of·him ¬alone ⁼this ⁼the ⁼cloak of·¬indecency of·him in to·what will·be·¬slept ifᵮ therefore should·¬yell·out·against unto °me I·will·¬listen·to·myself of·him ¬merciful for I·am

27 °Gods⁺ not you·will·¬curse and °¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼people of·you not evil you·will·¬say

28 °¬firstfruitses⁺ of·¬threshing-floor and of·¬winepress of·you not you·will·¬be·late °the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you you·will·give to·me*

29 thus you·will·do °the ⁼calf of·you and °the ⁼sheep of·you and °the ⁼¬donkey of·you seven °days⁺ will·be·himself ¬by °the ⁼mother then to·the ⁼eighth ⁼day you·will·¬pay to·me °it

30 and men⁺ ⁼holy⁺ you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me and °meat ⁼¬taken·by·wild·beasts not you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼dog ꜝ¬throw·off⁺ °it

23 not you·will·¬welcome·yourself °hearsay ⁼¬futile not you·will·¬consent·yourself with of·the ⁼¬unjust to·self-be·generated witness ⁼¬unjust

2 not you·will·be·yourself with of·¬greater⁺ upon to·evil not you·will·be·¬added with of·¬multitude to·¬turn·from with of·¬greater⁺ ¬so to·¬turn·from °judgment

3 and °¬poor not you·will·¬have·mercy in to·judgment

4 ifᵮ then you·should·¬meet to·the ⁼¬ox of·the ⁼¬enemy of·you or to·the ⁼¬donkey of·him to·¬led·astray ¬turning·away you·will·¬pay to·him

5 ifᵮ then you·should·¬see °the ⁼¬donkey of·the ⁼¬enemy of·you °having·¬collapsed ¬by °the ⁼¬cargo of·him not you·will·¬pass·by·yourself °it but you·will·¬raise·up·with °it with of·him

6 not you·will·¬pervert °judgment of·¬poor in to·judgment of·him

7 off of·all ⁼¬declaration ⁼¬unjust you·will·¬leave·yourself °¬innocent and °just not you·will·kill·off and not you·will·justify °the ⁼¬ungodly ¬because·of of·¬gifts⁺

8 and °¬gifts⁺ not you·will·take·yourself the·ones⁺ for ¬gifts⁺ ¬makes·blind °¬eyes⁺ of·looking and ¬ravages·himself °¬declarations⁺ ⁼just⁺

9 and °¬proselyte not you⁺·will·¬press·on you⁺ for you⁺·have·¬seen °the ⁼soul of·the ⁼¬proselyte they for ¬proselytes⁺ you⁺·were in to·earth ⁼Egypt

10 six °years⁺ you·will·seed °the ⁼earth of·you and you·will·¬assemble °the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·her

11 then to·the ⁼seventh °¬forgiveness you·will·do and you·will·¬loosen °her and they·will·¬eat·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬poors⁺ of·the ⁼nation of·you then °the⁺ ⁼¬left will·¬eat·himself the⁺ ⁼of·the·field⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ thus you·will·do °the ⁼vineyard of·you and °the ⁼¬Olivet of·you

12 six °days⁺ you·will·do °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh ¬rest so·that should·¬give·rest·himself the ⁼¬ox of·you and the ⁼¬donkey of·you and so·that should·¬refresh the ⁼son of·the ⁼¬maidservant of·you and the ⁼¬proselyte

13 °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ I·have·¬said unto °you⁺ ꜝ¬keep⁺·yourselves⁺ and °name of·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ not you⁺·will·be·¬reminded not·then ńot should·be·heard out of·the ⁼mouth of·you⁺

14 °three⁺ ⁼¬times⁺ of·the ⁼¬year ꜝ¬keep·a·festival⁺ to·me

15 °the ⁼¬festival of·the⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ ꜝ¬keep⁺·yourselves⁺ to·do seven °days⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °¬unleavened⁺ ¬just·as I·¬ordered·myself to·you ¬according·to °the ⁼¬time of·the ⁼month of·the⁺ ⁼young⁺ in for to·him you·came·out out of·Egypt not you·will·be·¬seen ¬before of·me ¬empty

16 and °¬festival of·¬harvest of·¬first·produces⁺ you·will·do of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you of·which⁺ ifᵮ you·should·seed in to·the ⁼field of·you and °¬festival °¬consummations⁺ upon of·¬departure of·the ⁼¬year in to·the ⁼¬synagogue of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you of·the·ones⁺ out of·the ⁼field of·you

17 °three⁺ ⁼¬times⁺ of·the ⁼¬year will·be·¬seen all ⁼¬male of·you ¬before of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you

18 ¬when for I·should·throw·out °nations⁺ off of·¬face of·you and I·¬widen °the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·you not you·will·¬sacrifice upon to·¬leaven °blood of·¬sacrifice of·me not·then ńot should·be·¬slept ¬fat of·the ⁼¬festival of·me ¬until ¬early

19 °the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬first·produces⁺ of·the ⁼earth of·you you·will·¬bring·in to °the ⁼house of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you not you·will·¬bake °lamb in to·milk of·mother of·him

20 and ¬¡see! I* I·mission·off °the ⁼¬announcer of·me ¬before of·¬face of·you so·that should·¬keep °you in to·the ⁼¬road ¬that should·¬bring·in °you to °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·¬made·ready to·you

21 ꜝ¬watch·out to·yourself and ꜝ¬listen·to of·him and ńot ꜝ¬disobey to·him not for ńot should·¬withdraw·himself °you the·one for name of·me is upon to·him

22 ifᵮ to·hearsay you⁺·should·hear of·the·one myˊ of·voice and you·should·do °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you and you⁺·should·¬keep °the ⁼¬covenant of·me you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me people ⁼¬special off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ myˊ for is all ⁼the ⁼earth you⁺ then you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me kingly ⁼priesthood and nation ⁼holy °these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ you·will·¬say to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ifᵮ to·hearsay you⁺·should·hear of·the ⁼voice of·me and you·should·do °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ I·should·tell to·you I·will·¬be·an·enemy to·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·you and I·will·¬be·an·opponent·myself to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬·an·opponent to·you

23 will·¬travel·himself for the ⁼¬announcer of·me self-¬governing of·you and will·¬bring·in °you unto °the Amorraion and Chettaion and Ferezaion and °¬Canaanite and Gergesaion and Euaion and Iebousaion and I·will·¬obliterate °them

24 not you·will·¬worship to·the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·them not·then ńot you·should·¬minister to·them not you·will·do ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them but to·¬destruction you·will·¬take·down and ¬breaking you·will·¬break °the⁺ ⁼¬monuments⁺ of·them

25 and you·will·¬minister to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you and I·will·¬praise °the ⁼bread of·you and °the ⁼wine of·you and °the ⁼water of·you and I·will·¬turn·away °¬sickness off of·you⁺

26 not will·be·himself ¬barren not·then ¬barren upon of·the ⁼earth of·you °the ⁼¬number of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·you I·should·¬fulfil

27 and °the ⁼¬fear I·will·mission·off °self-¬governing of·you and I·will·¬amaze °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ to °which⁺ you you·¬enter·yourself to °them and I·will·give °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ of·you °¬exiles⁺

28 and I·will·mission·off °the⁺ ⁼¬swarm·of·waspses⁺ of·¬before of·you and will·throw·out °the⁺ Amorraious and °the⁺ Euaious and °the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ and °the⁺ Chettaious off of·you

29 not I·will·throw·out °them in to·¬year ⁼one so·that ńot should·be·generated·himself the ⁼earth ⁼¬deserted and many⁺ should·be·generated·himself upon °you the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth

30 ¬according·to °¬small ⁼¬small I·will·throw·out °them off of·you ¬until iᵮ you·should·be·¬grown and you·should·¬inherit °the ⁼earth

31 and I·will·¬place °the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·you off of·the ⁼¬Red·Sea ⁼sea ¬until of·the ⁼sea ⁼the·one Fulistiim and off of·the ⁼¬deserted ¬until of·the ⁼great ⁼¬river ⁼¬Euphrates and I·will·¬deliver to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼self-¬lying·in·wait in to·the ⁼earth and I·will·throw·out °them off of·you

32 not you·will·¬consent·yourself to·them and to·the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·them °¬covenant

33 and not they·will·¬lie·in·wait·themselves in to·the ⁼earth of·you so·that ńot to·sin °you they·should·do unto °me ifᵮ for you·should·serve to·the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·them these⁺ they·will·be·themselves to·you ¬stumbling·block

24 and to·Mosheh told ꜝ¬ascend unto °lord you and Aharon and Nadab and ¬Abiud and seventy of·the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·will·¬worship ¬from·afar to·the ⁼lord

2 and will·¬come·near Mosheh ⁼¬alone unto °the ⁼God they then not they·will·¬come·near then the ⁼people not will·¬ascend·with·himself with of·them

3 came·to then Mosheh and ¬related·fully·himself to·the ⁼people °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·the ⁼God and °the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ was·¬answered then all ⁼the ⁼people to·voice ⁼one saying °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ spoke lord we·will·do and we·will·hear·ourselves

4 and wrote Mosheh °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·lord ¬rising·at·dawn then Mosheh °the·one ¬early ¬built °¬altar ¬by °the ⁼mountain and twelve °stones⁺ to °the·ones⁺ twelve °¬tribes⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el

5 and ¬sended·out °the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·¬carried·up °¬burnt·offerings⁺ and they·¬sacrificed °¬sacrifice of·¬saving to·the ⁼God °¬young·calfs⁺

6 taking then Mosheh °the ⁼¬half of·the ⁼blood ¬poured to °¬basins⁺ then °the ⁼¬half of·the ⁼blood ¬poured·on unto °the ⁼¬altar

7 and taking °the ⁼¬scroll of·the ⁼¬covenant ¬read to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the ⁼people and they·told °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ spoke lord we·will·do and we·will·hear·ourselves

8 taking then Mosheh °the ⁼blood ¬scattered·upon of·the ⁼people and told ¬¡see! °the ⁼blood of·the ⁼¬covenant ⁼which ¬made·a·covenant·himself lord unto °you⁺ about of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

9 and ¬ascended Mosheh and Aharon and Nadab and ¬Abiud and seventy of·the ⁼¬council·of·elders of·Yisra’el

10 and they·¬saw °the ⁼¬place ¬whither had·stood there the ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el and the·ones⁺ ¬by °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him ¬like work of·¬brick ⁼sapphire and ¬just·as ¬appearance of·¬firmness of·the ⁼heaven to·the ⁼¬cleanliness

11 and of·the⁺ ⁼¬chosen⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el not ¬dissented not·then one and they·were·¬seen in to·the ⁼¬place of·the ⁼God and they·¬ate and they·drank

12 and told lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬ascend unto °me to °the ⁼mountain and ꜝbe there and I·will·give to·you °the⁺ ⁼¬writing·tablets⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼stone⁺ °the ⁼law and °the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·wrote to·¬give·laws to·them

13 and ¬arising ⁼Mosheh and Yesou ⁼the ⁼having·¬stood·by to·him they·¬ascended to °the ⁼mountain of·the ⁼God

14 and to·the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ they·told ꜝ¬be·quiet⁺ ¬there ¬until we·should·¬live unto °you⁺ and ¬¡see! Aharon and Ōr with of·you⁺ ifᵮ to·whatever should·¬happen judgment ꜝlet·them·¬approach⁺·themselves to·them

15 and ¬ascended Mosheh and Yesou to °the ⁼mountain and ¬covered the ⁼cloud °the ⁼mountain

16 and ¬came the ⁼¬glory of·the ⁼God upon °the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one ¬Sinai and ¬covered °it the ⁼cloud six °days⁺ and called lord °the ⁼Mosheh to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh out of·¬midst of·the ⁼cloud

17 then the ⁼¬appearance of·the ⁼¬glory of·lord ¬like fire ⁼¬blazing upon of·the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼mountain ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

18 and came·to Mosheh to °the ⁼¬midst of·the ⁼cloud and ¬ascended to °the ⁼mountain and was there in to·the ⁼mountain forty °days⁺ and forty °nights⁺

25 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝtell to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ꜝtake⁺ to·me °¬firstfruitses⁺ ¬from of·all⁺ to·which⁺ iᵮ should·¬think to·the ⁼heart and you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ of·me

3 and this is the ⁼¬firstfruits °which you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ ¬from of·them °gold and °silver and °copper

4 and °hyacinth and °purple and °¬scarlet ⁼¬double and °¬fine·linen ⁼having·been·¬twined and °hair⁺ ⁼¬goat's⁺

5 and °leathers⁺ of·¬rams⁺ °having·been·¬dyed·red and °leathers⁺ ⁼hyacinth⁺ and °¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺

7 and °stones⁺ of·¬sardion and °stones⁺ to °the ⁼¬carving to °the ⁼¬shoulder-piece and °the ⁼¬floorlength

8 and you·will·do to·me °¬sanctification and I·will·be·¬seen in to·you⁺

9 and you·will·do to·me ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ I* to·you I·should·¬show in to·the ⁼mountain °the ⁼¬model of·the ⁼¬tent and °the ⁼¬model of·all⁺ of·the·ones⁺ of·¬vessels⁺ of·her thus you·will·do

10 and you·will·do °¬ark of·witness out of·¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ two of·¬cubits⁺ and of·¬half °the ⁼¬length and of·¬cubit and of·¬half °the ⁼¬width and of·¬cubit and of·¬half °the ⁼¬height

11 and you·will·¬gild °her to·gold ⁼¬clean ¬outside and ¬inwardly you·will·gild °her and you·will·do to·her °¬waved·borders⁺ ⁼¬twisted⁺ ⁼golden⁺ ¬surrounding

12 and you·will·¬drive to·her °four⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ ⁼golden⁺ and you·will·¬put upon °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺ two °¬rings⁺ upon °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the ⁼one and two °¬rings⁺ upon °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the ⁼second

13 you·will·do then °¬bearing·poles⁺ °¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ and you·will·¬gild °them to·gold

14 and you·will·¬bring·in °the⁺ ⁼¬bearing·poles⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺ of·the ⁼¬ark to·¬take·up °the ⁼¬ark in to·them

15 in to·the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ of·the ⁼¬ark they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬bearing·poles⁺ ⁼¬fixed⁺

16 and you·will·throw·in to °the ⁼¬ark °the⁺ ⁼witnesses⁺ ⁼which⁺ iᵮ I·should·give to·you

17 and you·will·do °¬propitiation ⁼¬lid of·gold ⁼¬clean two of·¬cubits⁺ and of·¬half °the ⁼¬length and of·¬cubit and of·¬half °the ⁼¬width

18 and you·will·do two °¬Cherubs⁺ ⁼golden⁺ ¬??? and you·will·¬put °them out of·¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺ of·the ⁼¬propitiation

19 they·will·be·done ¬Cherub ⁼one out of·the ⁼¬corner ⁼this and °¬Cherub one out of·the ⁼¬corner ⁼the ⁼second ⁼the ⁼¬propitiation and you·will·do °the·ones⁺ two °¬Cherubs⁺ upon °the·ones⁺ two °¬corners⁺

20 they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬Cherubs⁺ ⁼¬stretching·out °the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ ¬about ¬overshadowing to·the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them upon of·the ⁼¬propitiation and the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·them to °one·another⁺ to °the ⁼¬propitiation they·will·be·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Cherubs⁺

21 and you·will·¬put °the ⁼¬propitiation upon °the ⁼¬ark ¬from·above and to °the ⁼¬ark you·will·throw·in °the⁺ ⁼witnesses⁺ ⁼which⁺ iᵮ I·should·give to·you

22 and I·will·be·known to·you ¬from·there and I·should·speak to·you ¬from·above of·the ⁼¬propitiation ¬each °¬midst of·the·ones⁺ two of·¬Cherubs⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼being upon of·the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼witness and ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you unto °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

23 and you·will·do °¬table of·gold ⁼¬clean two of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬length and of·¬cubit °the ⁼¬breadth and of·¬cubit and of·¬half °the ⁼¬height

29 and you·will·do °the⁺ ⁼¬bowls⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬incense·pans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬libation·bowls⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬cups⁺ in to·which⁺ you·will·¬pour·a·libation in to·them of·gold ⁼¬clean you·will·do °them

30 and you·will·¬put upon °the ⁼¬table °breads⁺ ⁼¬face·to·face⁺ ¬in·front·of of·me through of·all

31 and you·will·do °¬lampstand out of·gold ⁼¬clean °¬turned you·will·do °the ⁼¬lampstand the ⁼¬stem of·her and the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬basins⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬knobs⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬lilies⁺ out of·her will·be·himself

32 six then ¬branches⁺ ⁼self-¬departing out of·¬sideways⁺ three⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·the ⁼¬lampstand out of·the ⁼¬corner of·her of·the ⁼one and three⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·the ⁼¬lampstand out of·the ⁼¬corner ⁼the ⁼second

35 the ⁼¬knob ¬by °the·ones⁺ two °¬branches⁺ out of·her and ¬knob ¬by °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ out of·her thus to·the·ones⁺ six to·¬branches⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬departing out of·the ⁼¬lampstand

36 the⁺ ⁼¬knobs⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ out of·her ꜝlet·them·be⁺ ¬all ⁼¬turned out of·one ⁼gold ⁼¬clean

38 and °the ⁼¬funnel of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬underparts⁺ of·her out of·gold ⁼¬clean you·will·do

40 ꜝ¬see you·will·do ¬according·to °the ⁼¬mark ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬shown to·you in to·the ⁼mountain

26 and °the ⁼¬tent you·will·do ten °¬curtains⁺ out of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined and of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬twined °¬Cherubs⁺ to·¬work of·¬weaver you·will·do °them

2 ¬length of·the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼one eight and twenty of·¬cubits⁺ and ¬breadth of·four⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼one will·be·himself ¬measure ⁼the it will·be·himself to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬curtains⁺

3 five then ¬curtains⁺ they·will·be·themselves out of·one·another⁺ self-having the ⁼óther out of·the ⁼óther and five ¬curtains⁺ they·will·be·themselves self-¬holding óther to·the ⁼óther

4 and you·will·do to·them °¬loops⁺ ⁼hyacinth⁺ upon of·the ⁼lip of·the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼one out of·the ⁼one ⁼¬part to °the ⁼¬compact and thus you·will·do upon of·the ⁼lip of·the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼¬outer unto to·the ⁼¬compact ⁼the ⁼second

5 fifty °¬loops⁺ you·will·do to·the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼one and fifty °¬loops⁺ you·will·do out of·the ⁼¬part of·the ⁼¬curtain ¬according·to °the ⁼¬compact of·the ⁼second ¬facing⁺ ⁼¬resisting to·one·another⁺ to °¬each

6 and you·will·do °¬hooks⁺ fifty °golden⁺ and you·will·¬join·together °the⁺ ⁼¬curtains⁺ °óther to·the ⁼óther to·the⁺ ⁼¬hooks⁺ and will·be·himself the ⁼¬tent ⁼one

7 and you·will·do °¬hide·coverings⁺ ⁼¬of·hair⁺ °¬shelter upon of·the ⁼¬tent eleven °¬hide·coverings⁺ you·will·do °them

8 the ⁼¬length of·the ⁼¬hide·covering ⁼the ⁼one will·be·himself thirty of·¬cubits⁺ and of·four⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ the ⁼¬breadth of·the ⁼¬hide·covering ⁼the ⁼one ¬measure ⁼the it will·be·himself to·the·ones⁺ eleven to·¬hide·coverings⁺

9 and you·will·¬join·together °the·ones⁺ five °¬hide·coverings⁺ upon °the °it and °the·ones⁺ six °¬hide·coverings⁺ upon °the °it and you·will·¬double °the ⁼¬hide·covering ⁼the ⁼sixth ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼¬tent

10 and you·will·do °¬loops⁺ fifty upon of·the ⁼lip of·the ⁼¬hide·covering ⁼the ⁼one ⁼the·one ¬each °¬midst ¬according·to °¬compact and fifty °¬loops⁺ you·will·do upon of·the ⁼lip of·the ⁼¬hide·covering ⁼the ⁼¬joining·together ⁼the ⁼second

11 and you·will·do °¬hooks⁺ ⁼copper⁺ fifty and you·will·¬join·together °the⁺ ⁼¬hooks⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼¬loops⁺ and you·will·¬join·together °the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ and will·be·himself one

12 and you·will·¬lay °the ⁼¬increasing in to·the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent °the ⁼¬half of·the ⁼¬hide·covering °the ⁼having·self-¬left you·will·¬cover·up °the ⁼¬increasing of·the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent you·will·¬cover·up ¬after of·the ⁼¬tent

13 °¬cubit out of·this and °¬cubit out of·this out of·the ⁼¬·higher of·the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ out of·the ⁼¬length of·the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent will·be·himself ¬concealing upon °the⁺ ⁼¬sideways⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent ¬in and ¬in so·that should·¬cover

14 and you·will·do °¬overcovering to·the ⁼¬tent °leathers⁺ of·¬rams⁺ °having·been·¬dyed·red and °¬coverings⁺ ⁼leathers⁺ ⁼hyacinth⁺ ¬about

15 and you·will·do °pillars⁺ to·the ⁼¬tent out of·¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺

16 ten of·¬cubits⁺ you·will·do °the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one and of·¬cubit ⁼one and of·¬half °the ⁼¬width of·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one

17 two °¬joints⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one °¬resisting °óther to·the ⁼óther thus you·will·do to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent

18 and you·will·do °pillars⁺ to·the ⁼¬tent twenty °pillars⁺ out of·the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto °north

19 and forty °¬foots⁺ ⁼silver⁺ you·will·do to·the·ones⁺ twenty to·pillars⁺ two ¬foots⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one to °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·him and two ¬foots⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one to °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·him

20 and °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the ⁼second ⁼the·one unto °south twenty °pillars⁺

21 and forty °¬foots⁺ of·them °silver⁺ two °¬foots⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one to °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·him and two °¬foots⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one to °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·him

22 and out of·the·ones⁺ ¬after of·the ⁼¬tent ¬according·to °the ⁼¬part ⁼the·one unto °sea you·will·do six °pillars⁺

23 and two °pillars⁺ you·will·do upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent out of·the⁺ ⁼¬posterior⁺

24 and will·be·himself out of·¬equal ¬from·below ¬according·to °the °it they·will·be·themselves ¬equal⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼¬scrolls⁺ to °¬coupling ⁼one thus you·will·do to·¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼two⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺ ꜝlet·them·be⁺

25 and they·will·be·themselves eight pillars⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them silver⁺ ten six two ¬foots⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one to °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·him and two ¬foots⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼one

26 and you·will·do °¬bars⁺ out of·¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ five to·the ⁼one ⁼pillar out of·the ⁼one ⁼¬part of·the ⁼¬tent

27 and five °¬bars⁺ to·the ⁼pillar to·the ⁼¬corner of·the ⁼¬tent to·the ⁼second and five °¬bars⁺ to·the ⁼pillar ⁼the ⁼¬posterior to·the ⁼¬corner of·the ⁼¬tent to·the·one unto °sea

28 and the ⁼¬bar ⁼the ⁼¬midst ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ ꜝlet·¬penetrate·himself off of·the ⁼one ⁼¬corner to °the ⁼óther ⁼¬corner

29 and °the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ you·will·¬gild to·gold and °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ you·will·do °golden⁺ to °which⁺ you·will·¬bring·in °the⁺ ⁼¬bars⁺ and you·will·¬gild °the⁺ ⁼¬bars⁺ to·gold

30 and you·will·¬arise °the ⁼¬tent ¬according·to °the ⁼¬appearance ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬shown to·you in to·the ⁼mountain

31 and you·will·do °¬curtain out of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬twined and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬spun °work ⁼¬woven you·will·do °it °¬Cherubs⁺

32 and you·will·¬put °it upon of·four⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ ⁼having·been·gilded to·gold and the⁺ ⁼¬scrolls⁺ of·them golden⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them four⁺ ⁼silver⁺

33 and you·will·¬place °the ⁼¬curtain upon °the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ and you·will·¬bring·in there ¬inside of·the ⁼¬curtain °the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼witness and will·¬determine °the ⁼¬curtain to·you⁺ ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼holy and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼holy of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

34 and you·will·¬cover to·the ⁼¬curtain °the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼witness in to·the ⁼holy of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

35 and you·will·¬place °the ⁼¬table ¬outside of·the ⁼¬curtain and °the ⁼¬lampstand ¬opposite of·the ⁼¬table upon of·¬part of·the ⁼¬tent °the·one unto °south and °the ⁼¬table you·will·¬place upon of·¬part of·the ⁼¬tent °the·one unto °north

36 and you·will·do °¬draw·curtain out of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬twined and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined °work of·¬embroiderer

37 and you·will·do to·the ⁼¬curtain five °pillars⁺ and you·will·gild °them to·gold and the⁺ ⁼¬scrolls⁺ of·them golden⁺ and you·will·¬cast·in·a·furnace to·them five °¬foots⁺ ⁼copper⁺

27 and you·will·do °¬altar out of·¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ five of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬length and five of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬breadth ¬square will·be·himself °the ⁼¬altar and of·three⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬height of·him

2 and you·will·do °the⁺ ⁼horns⁺ upon of·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺ out of·him will·be·himself °the⁺ ⁼horns⁺ and you·will·¬cover °them to·copper

3 and you·will·do °crown to·the ⁼¬altar and °the ⁼¬lid of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬bowls⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬meat·hooks⁺ of·him and °the ⁼¬censer of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·him you·will·do °copper⁺

4 and you·will·do to·him °¬grill to·work ⁼¬latticed °copper and you·will·do to·the ⁼¬grill °four⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ ⁼copper⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺

5 and you·will·¬lay °them ¬by °the ⁼¬grill of·the ⁼¬altar ¬from·below will·be·himself then the ⁼¬grill ¬until of·the ⁼¬half ⁼the ⁼¬altar

6 and you·will·do to·the ⁼¬altar you·¬wear out of·¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ and you·will·¬brass·plate °them to·copper

7 and you·will·¬bring·in °the·ones⁺ you·¬wear to °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ and ꜝlet·them·be⁺ the·ones⁺ you·¬wear ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬sides⁺ of·the ⁼¬altar in to·the·one to·¬take·up °it

8 ⁼¬hollow ⁼¬planked you·will·do °it ¬according·to °the ⁼¬held·forth·as·an·example to·you in to·the ⁼mountain thus you·will·do °it

9 and you·will·do °¬palace to·the ⁼¬tent to °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto °¬southwest °¬shrouds⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace out of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined °¬length hundred of·¬cubits⁺ to·the ⁼one ⁼¬corner

10 and the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·them twenty and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them twenty copper⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬hooks⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬clippers⁺ of·them silver⁺

11 thus to·the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto ¬??? °¬shrouds⁺ hundred of·¬cubits⁺ °¬length and the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·them twenty and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them twenty copper⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬hooks⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬clippers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them having·self-¬silvered·plate to·silver

12 then °the ⁼¬breadth of·the ⁼¬palace °the·one ¬according·to °sea ¬shrouds⁺ fifty of·¬cubits⁺ pillars⁺ of·them ten and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them ten

13 and ¬breadth of·the ⁼¬palace °the·one unto °south ¬shrouds⁺ fifty of·¬cubits⁺ pillars⁺ of·them ten and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them ten

14 and ¬fifteen of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬height of·the⁺ ⁼¬shrouds⁺ to·the ⁼¬corner ⁼the ⁼one pillars⁺ of·them three⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them three⁺

15 and °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the ⁼second ten five of·¬cubits⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬shrouds⁺ °the ⁼¬height pillars⁺ of·them three⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them three⁺

16 and to·the ⁼gate of·the ⁼¬palace ¬veil twenty of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬height out of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬twined and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined to·the ⁼¬embroidery of·the ⁼¬stitcher pillars⁺ of·them four⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them four⁺

17 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace ¬surrounding having·self-¬silvered·plate to·silver and the⁺ ⁼¬scrolls⁺ of·them silver⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them copper⁺

18 then °the ⁼¬length of·the ⁼¬palace hundred upon hundred and ¬breadth fifty upon fifty and ¬height five of·¬cubits⁺ out of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined and the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them copper⁺

19 and all ⁼the ⁼¬apparatus and °all⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬work·tools⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬pegs⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace copper⁺

20 and you ꜝ¬direct to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ꜝlet·them·take⁺ to·you °¬olive·oil out of·¬olive·oils⁺ °¬pure ⁼¬clean ⁼having·self-chopped to °light to·¬kindle so·that should·¬kindle·himself ¬lamp through of·all

21 in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness ¬outside of·the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the·one upon of·the ⁼¬covenant will·¬kindle °it Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him off of·¬evening ¬until ¬early ¬in·front·of of·lord law ⁼eternal to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺ ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

28 and you ꜝ¬bring·near·yourself unto °yourself °the·one also °Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him out of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·be·priest to·me °Aharon and Nadab and °¬Abiud and °¬Eleazar and Ithamar °sons⁺ of·Aharon

2 and you·will·do °robe ⁼holy to·Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you to °¬honor and °¬glory

3 and you ꜝspeak to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼wise⁺ to·the ⁼¬mind °which⁺ I·¬filled·up of·breath of·¬insight and they·will·do °the ⁼robe ⁼the ⁼holy to·Aharon to °the ⁼holy in to·which will·be·priest to·me

4 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ °which⁺ they·will·do °the ⁼¬breast-plate and °the ⁼¬shoulder-piece and °the ⁼¬floorlength and °tunic ⁼¬fringed and °¬turban and °¬belt and they·will·do °robes⁺ ⁼holy⁺ to·Aharon and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him to °the·one to·be·priest to·me

5 and they they·will·take·themselves °the ⁼gold and °the ⁼hyacinth and °the ⁼purple and °the ⁼¬scarlet and °the ⁼¬fine·linen

6 and they·will·do °the ⁼¬shoulder-piece out of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined °work ⁼¬woven of·¬embroiderer

7 two ¬shoulder-pieces⁺ ⁼¬holding they·will·be·themselves to·him óther °the ⁼óther upon to·the⁺ ⁼two⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ having·been·¬been·attached·to

8 and the ⁼¬woven·work of·the⁺ ⁼¬shoulder-pieces⁺ which is upon to·him ¬according·to °the ⁼¬do out of·it will·be·himself out of·gold and of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬spun and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined

9 and you·will·take·yourself °the·ones⁺ two °stones⁺ ⁼stones⁺ of·¬emerald and you·will·¬carve in to·them °the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

10 six °names⁺ upon °the ⁼stone ⁼the ⁼one and °the·ones⁺ six °names⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ upon °the ⁼stone ⁼the ⁼second ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·them

11 °work of·¬stonecutting ⁼¬skill °¬carving of·seal you·will·¬carve °the·ones⁺ two °stones⁺ upon to·the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

12 and you·will·¬place °the·ones⁺ two °stones⁺ upon of·the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ of·the ⁼¬shoulder-piece stones⁺ of·¬memorial they·are to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and will·¬take·up·himself Aharon °the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬before of·lord upon of·the·ones⁺ two of·shoulders⁺ of·him °¬memorial about of·them

13 and you·will·do °¬bezels⁺ out of·gold ⁼¬clean

14 and you·will·do two °¬bordered·fringes⁺ out of·gold ⁼¬clean °having·been·¬mixed·with in to·¬flowers⁺ °work of·¬wreathen and you·will·¬put °the⁺ ⁼¬bordered·fringes⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·been·¬woven upon °the⁺ ⁼¬bezels⁺ ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬shoulder·straps⁺ of·them out of·the⁺ ⁼¬in·front⁺

15 and you·will·do °¬oracles of·the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ °work of·¬embroiderer ¬according·to °the ⁼¬proportion of·the ⁼¬shoulder-piece you·will·do °it out of·gold and of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬twined and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined you·will·do °it

16 ¬square will·be·himself ¬double of·¬span °the ⁼¬length and of·¬span °the ⁼¬breadth

17 and you·will·¬interweave in to·it °¬woven·work ⁼¬inlaid·with·precious·stone ⁼¬arranged·in·four·rows ¬row of·stones⁺ will·be·himself ¬sardion ⁼topaz and ¬emerald the ⁼¬row ⁼the ⁼one

18 and the ⁼¬row ⁼the ⁼second ⁼¬charcoal and sapphire and jasper

19 and the ⁼¬row ⁼the ⁼third ¬amber ¬agate and ¬amethyst

20 and the ⁼¬row ⁼the ⁼fourth ⁼¬chrysolite and beryl and ¬onyx having·been·¬covered to·gold having·been·¬bound·with in to·gold ꜝlet·them·be⁺ ¬according·to °¬row of·them

21 and the⁺ ⁼stones⁺ ꜝlet·them·be⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ten two ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·them ¬carvings⁺ of·seals⁺ ¬each ¬according·to °the ⁼name ꜝlet·them·be⁺ to ten two °¬tribes⁺

22 and you·will·do upon °the ⁼¬oracles °¬borders⁺ ⁼having·self-¬been·closely·joined °work ⁼¬chain-work out of·gold ⁼¬clean

29 and will·take·himself Aharon °the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el upon of·the ⁼¬oracles of·the ⁼judgment upon of·the ⁼¬chest to·¬entering to °the ⁼holy ⁼¬memorial ¬before of·the ⁼God and you·will·¬place upon °the ⁼¬oracles of·the ⁼judgment °the⁺ ⁼¬borders⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬chain-work⁺ upon of·¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬corners⁺ of·the ⁼¬oracles you·will·¬put and °the·ones⁺ two °¬bezels⁺ you·will·¬put upon °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ of·the ⁼¬shoulder-piece ¬according·to °¬face

30 and you·will·¬put upon °the ⁼¬oracles of·the ⁼judgment °the ⁼¬manifestation and °the ⁼¬truth and will·be·himself upon of·the ⁼¬chest of·Aharon ¬when should·¬enter·himself to °the ⁼holy ¬in·front·of of·lord and will·¬bear Aharon °the·ones⁺ judgments⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el upon of·the ⁼¬chest ¬in·front·of of·lord through of·all

31 and you·will·do °¬undergarment ⁼¬floorlength ⁼¬all ⁼hyacinth

32 and will·be·himself the ⁼¬cleft out of·him °¬midst °¬edge °having ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬cleft °work of·¬weaver °the ⁼¬compact ⁼having·self-¬woven·together out of·it so·that ńot should·be·¬thrown·violently

33 and you·will·do upon °the ⁼¬hem of·the ⁼¬undergarment ¬from·below ¬like of·¬blossomming °¬pomegranates⁺ °¬pomegranate·figures⁺ out of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬spun and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined upon of·the ⁼¬hem of·the ⁼¬undergarment ¬surrounding °the °it then °¬appearance °¬pomegranate·figures⁺ ⁼golden⁺ and °¬bells⁺ ¬each °¬midst of·these⁺ ¬surrounding

34 ¬from °¬pomegranate·figure ⁼golden ⁼¬bell and °¬flowered·work upon of·the ⁼¬hem of·the ⁼¬undergarment ¬surrounding

35 and will·be·himself Aharon in to·the·one to·¬minister ¬audible ⁼the ⁼voice of·him to·¬entering to °the ⁼holy ¬in·front·of of·lord and to·¬going·out so·that ńot should·die·off

36 and you·will·do °¬leaf ⁼golden ⁼¬clean and you·will·¬shape in to·it °¬impression of·seal ¬sanctification of·lord

37 and you·will·¬put °it upon of·hyacinth ⁼having·self-¬twined and will·be·himself upon of·the ⁼¬mitre ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼¬mitre will·be·himself

38 and will·be·himself upon of·the ⁼¬forehead of·Aharon and will·¬expel Aharon °the⁺ ⁼¬sins⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ °whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·make·holy the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el of·all ⁼¬gift of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·them and will·be·himself upon of·the ⁼¬forehead of·Aharon through of·all °¬acceptable to·them ¬before of·lord

39 and the⁺ ⁼¬fringes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼tunics⁺ out of·¬fine·linen and you·will·do °¬turban ⁼¬fine·linen and °¬belt you·will·do °work of·¬embroiderer

40 and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Aharon you·will·do °tunics⁺ and °¬belts⁺ and °¬turbans⁺ you·will·do to·them to °¬honor and °¬glory

41 and you·will·¬put·on °them °Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him and you·will·christen °them and you·will·¬fill·up of·them °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ and you·will·make·holy °them so·that they·should·be·priest to·me

42 and you·will·do to·them °¬pants⁺ ⁼¬of·flaxen·linen⁺ to·¬cover °¬indecency of·¬skin of·them off of·¬loins ¬until of·¬thighs⁺ will·be·himself

43 and will·have Aharon °them and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him as iᵮ they·should·¬enter·themselves to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness or ¬when they·should·¬approach·themselves to·¬minister unto °the ⁼¬altar of·the ⁼holy and not they·will·¬bring·upon·themselves unto °¬selves⁺ °sin so·that ńot they·should·die·off law ⁼eternal to·him and to·the ⁼seed of·him with °him

29 and these⁺ is °which⁺ you·will·do to·them to·make·holy °them ¬so to·be·priest to·me °them you·will·take·yourself °¬young·calf out of·¬oxes⁺ °one and °¬rams⁺ two °¬blameless⁺

2 and °breads⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ ⁼having·self-¬mixed·up in to·¬olive·oil and °¬pancakes⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ ⁼having·self-christened in to·¬olive·oil °¬fine·flour out of·¬wheats⁺ you·will·do °them

3 and you·will·¬put °them upon °¬bin ⁼one and you·will·¬bring·to °them upon to·the ⁼¬bin and °the ⁼¬young·calf and °the·ones⁺ two °¬rams⁺

4 and °Aharon and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him you·will·¬bring·near upon °the·ones⁺ of·¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and you·will·¬wash °them in to·water

5 and taking °the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ you·will·¬put·on Aharon °the ⁼brother of·you and °the ⁼tunic ⁼the ⁼¬floorlength and °the ⁼¬shoulder-piece and °the ⁼¬oracles and you·will·¬join·together to·him °the ⁼¬oracles unto °the ⁼¬shoulder-piece

6 and you·will·¬put °the ⁼¬mitre upon °the ⁼head of·him and you·will·¬put °the ⁼¬leaf ⁼the ⁼¬sanctification upon °the ⁼¬mitre

7 and you·will·take·yourself of·the ⁼¬olive·oil ⁼the ⁼christening and you·will·¬pour·on °it upon °the ⁼head of·him and you·will·christen °him

8 and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him you·will·¬bring·near and you·will·¬put·on °them ⁼tunics⁺

9 and you·will·¬dress °them to·the⁺ ⁼¬belts⁺ and you·will·¬put·on to·them °the⁺ ⁼¬turbans⁺ and will·be·himself to·them priesthood to·me* to °the ⁼eternity and you·will·¬perfect °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·Aharon and °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him

10 and you·will·¬bring·near °the ⁼calf upon °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and they·will·¬put Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them upon °the ⁼head of·the ⁼calf ¬before of·lord ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

11 and you·will·¬slaughter °the ⁼calf ¬before of·lord ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

12 and you·will·take·yourself off of·the ⁼blood of·the ⁼calf and you·will·¬place upon of·the⁺ ⁼horns⁺ of·the ⁼¬altar to·the ⁼finger of·you then °the ⁼¬henceforth ⁼all ⁼blood you·will·¬pour·out ¬from °the ⁼¬foot of·the ⁼¬altar

13 and you·will·take·yourself °all ⁼the ⁼¬fat ⁼the·one upon of·the ⁼¬belly and °the ⁼lobe of·the ⁼¬liver and °the·ones⁺ two °¬kidneys⁺ and °the ⁼¬fat ⁼the·one upon of·them and you·will·¬put upon °the ⁼¬altar

14 then °the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ of·the ⁼calf and °the ⁼leather and °the ⁼¬dung you·will·¬burn to·fire out of·the ⁼¬barracks ⁼sin for is

15 and °the ⁼¬ram you·will·take·yourself °the ⁼one and they·will·¬put Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them upon °the ⁼head of·the ⁼¬ram

16 and you·will·¬slaughter °him and taking °the ⁼blood you·will·¬pour·on unto °the ⁼¬altar ¬surrounding

17 and °the ⁼¬ram you·will·¬cut·in·two ¬according·to °¬members⁺ and you·will·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼¬entrailses⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ to·water and you·will·¬put upon °the⁺ ⁼¬pieces⁺ wiŧh to·the ⁼head

18 and you·will·¬carry·up °¬all ⁼the ⁼¬ram upon °the ⁼¬altar ⁼¬burnt·offering to·lord to °¬aroma of·¬aroma ¬sacrifice to·lord is

19 and you·will·take·yourself °the ⁼¬ram ⁼the ⁼second and will·¬put Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them upon °the ⁼head of·the ⁼¬ram

20 and you·will·¬slaughter °him and you·will·take·yourself of·the ⁼blood of·him and you·will·¬put upon °the ⁼lobe of·the ⁼ear of·Aharon of·the ⁼¬right and upon °the ⁼¬end of·the ⁼hand ⁼the ⁼¬right and upon °the ⁼¬end of·the ⁼foot ⁼the ⁼¬right and upon °the⁺ ⁼lobes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him of·the⁺ ⁼¬right⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬end⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them of·the⁺ ⁼¬right⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬end⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬right⁺

21 and you·will·take·yourself off of·the ⁼blood ⁼the·one off of·the ⁼¬altar and off of·the ⁼¬olive·oil of·the ⁼¬anointing and you·will·¬sprinkle upon °Aharon and upon °the ⁼robe of·him and upon °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and upon °the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him and will·be·made·holy he and the ⁼robe of·him and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him then °the ⁼blood of·the ⁼¬ram you·will·¬pour·on unto °the ⁼¬altar ¬surrounding

22 and you·will·take·yourself off of·the ⁼¬ram °the ⁼¬fat of·him and °the ⁼¬fat ⁼the ⁼¬covering °the ⁼¬belly and °the ⁼lobe of·the ⁼¬liver and °the·ones⁺ two °¬kidneys⁺ and °the ⁼¬fat ⁼the·one upon of·them and °the ⁼arm ⁼the ⁼¬right is for ¬perfection ⁼this

23 and °bread ⁼one out of·¬olive·oil and °¬pancake ⁼one off of·the ⁼¬bin of·the⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬planed ¬before of·lord

24 and you·will·¬put °the⁺ ⁼all⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·Aharon and upon °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and you·will·¬separate °them °¬separation ¬before of·lord

25 and you·will·take·yourself °them out of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and you·will·¬carry·up upon °the ⁼¬altar of·the ⁼¬bringing·of·a·whole·burnt-offering to °¬aroma of·¬aroma ¬before of·lord ¬yield is to·lord

26 and you·will·take·yourself °the ⁼¬breast off of·the ⁼¬ram of·the ⁼¬perfection which is Aharon and you·will·¬separate °it ⁼¬separation ¬before of·lord and will·be·himself to·you in to·¬part

27 and you·will·make·holy °the ⁼¬breast ⁼¬separation and °the ⁼arm of·the ⁼¬choice·portion which has·¬separated·himself and which has·¬removed·himself off of·the ⁼¬ram of·the ⁼¬perfection off of·the ⁼Aharon and off of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him

28 and will·be·himself to·Aharon and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him law ⁼eternal ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el is for ¬choice·portion ⁼this and ¬choice·portion will·be·himself ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·the⁺ ⁼¬offerings⁺ of·the·ones⁺ of·¬savings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬choice·portion to·lord

29 and the ⁼robe of·the ⁼holy which is to·Aharon will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with °him to·be·christened °them in to·them and to·¬perfect °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them

30 seven °days⁺ will·¬put·on·himself °them the ⁼priest ⁼the·one anti of·him of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him which will·come·to·himself to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness to·¬minister in to·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

34 ifᵮ then should·be·¬left·behind off of·the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ of·the ⁼¬sacrifice ⁼the ⁼¬perfection and of·the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ ¬until ¬early you·will·¬burn °the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ to·fire not will·be·¬eaten ¬sanctification for is

35 and you·will·do to·Aharon and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him thus ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ I·¬ordered·myself to·you seven °days⁺ you·will·¬perfect of·them °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺

36 and °the ⁼¬young·calf of·the ⁼sin you·will·do to·the ⁼day of·the ⁼¬cleansing and you·will·¬clean °the ⁼¬altar in to·the·one to·make·holy °you upon to·it and you·will·christen °it ¬so to·make·holy °it

39 °the ⁼¬lamb ⁼the ⁼one you·will·do °the·one ¬early and °the ⁼¬lamb ⁼the ⁼second you·will·do °the ⁼¬dusk

30 and you·will·do °¬altar of·¬incense out of·¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ and you·will·do °it

2 of·¬cubit °the ⁼¬length and of·¬cubit the ⁼¬breadth ⁼¬square will·be·himself and two of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬height out of·it will·be·himself the⁺ ⁼horns⁺ of·it

2 and says to·them Aharon ꜝ¬take·away⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼golden⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·you⁺ and of·daughters⁺ and ꜝ¬bear⁺ unto °me

3 and they·¬took·away·themselves all ⁼the ⁼people °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼golden⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·them and they·¬bore unto °Aharon

13 ¬remembered of·Abraham and of·Yitzchaq and of·Ya‘aqob of·the·ones⁺ yourˊ of·¬slaves⁺ to·which⁺ you·¬swore ¬according·to of·yourself and you·spoke unto °them saying I·will·¬greatly·multiply °the ⁼seed of·you⁺ ¬like °the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ of·the ⁼heaven to·the ⁼¬multitude and °all ⁼the ⁼earth ⁼this ⁼which you·told to·give to·the ⁼seed of·them and they·will·¬hold·back °her to °the ⁼eternity

18 and says not is voice of·¬originating ¬according·to °¬strength not·then voice of·¬originating of·¬turning but °voice of·¬originating of·wine I* I·hear

19 and ¬when ¬came·near to·the ⁼¬barracks ¬sees °the ⁼calf and °the⁺ ⁼choruss⁺ and ¬angered to·¬wrath Mosheh ¬threw off of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him °the·ones⁺ two °¬tablets⁺ and ¬broke °them ¬by °the ⁼mountain

25 and ¬seeing ⁼Mosheh °the ⁼people ¬that has·been·¬dispersed ¬dispersed for °them Aharon °¬derision to·the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ of·them

26 stood then Mosheh upon of·the ⁼gate ⁼the ⁼¬barracks and told what unto °lord ꜝlet·¬come unto °me they·¬assembled therefore unto °him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Levi

27 and says to·them °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ꜝ¬place⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬each °the·one of·himself °sword upon °the ⁼¬thigh and ꜝ¬pass·through⁺ and ꜝ¬return⁺ off of·gate upon °gate through of·the ⁼¬barracks and ꜝkill·off⁺ ¬each °the ⁼brother of·him and ¬each °the ⁼¬neighbor of·him and ¬each °the·one ¬near of·him

28 and they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Levi ¬as spoke to·them Mosheh and they·¬collapsed out of·the ⁼people in to·that ⁼the ⁼day to °three·thousand⁺ ⁼men⁺

29 and told to·them Mosheh you⁺·¬fulfilled °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ today to·lord ¬each in to·the ⁼son or to·the ⁼brother to·be·given upon °you⁺ °¬praise

30 and was·generated·himself with °the·one ¬tomorrow told Mosheh unto °the ⁼people you⁺ you⁺·have·sinned °sin ⁼great and now I·will·¬ascend·myself unto °the ⁼God so·that I·should·¬appease·myself about of·the ⁼sin of·you⁺

31 ¬returned then Mosheh unto °lord and told I·¬pray·myself lord has·sinned the ⁼people ⁼this °sin ⁼great and they·did to·¬selves⁺ °Gods⁺ ⁼golden⁺

32 and now if ¬on·the·other·hand you·¬release to·them °the ⁼sin ꜝ¬release if then ńot ꜝ¬blot·out °me out of·the ⁼¬book of·you of·which you·wrote

33 and told lord unto °Mosheh if whatever has·sinned ¬before of·me I·will·¬blot·out °him out of·the ⁼¬book of·me

34 now then ꜝ¬proceed ꜝ¬come and ꜝ¬guide °the ⁼people ⁼this to °the ⁼¬place ⁼which I·¬said to·you ¬¡see! the ⁼¬announcer of·me ¬goes·before·himself ¬before of·¬face of·you to·which then iᵮ to·day I·should·¬visit·myself I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them °the ⁼sin of·them

35 and ¬struck lord °the ⁼people about of·the ⁼¬do of·the ⁼calf ⁼which did Aharon

33 and told lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬travel·yourself ꜝ¬ascend ¬from·here you and the ⁼people of·you °which⁺ you·¬led·out out of·earth ⁼Egypt to °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·¬swore to·the ⁼Abraham and of·Yitzchaq and to·Ya‘aqob saying to·the ⁼seed of·you⁺ I·will·give °her

2 and I·will·¬send·with °the ⁼¬announcer of·me ¬before of·¬face of·you and will·throw·out °the Amorraion and Chettaion and Ferezaion and Gergesaion and Euaion and Iebousaion

3 and I·will·¬bring·in °you to °earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey not for ńot I·should·¬ascend·with with of·you through °the·one °people ⁼¬stiff-necked °you to·be so·that ńot I·should·¬consume °you in to·the ⁼¬road

4 and hearing ⁼the ⁼people °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼the ⁼¬evil ⁼this they·¬mourned in to·¬mournful⁺

5 and told lord to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el you⁺ people ⁼¬stiff-necked you⁺·¬see ńot °¬plague ⁼other I·will·¬bring·upon I* upon °you⁺ and I·should·¬consume °you⁺ now therefore ꜝ¬remove⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬glories⁺ of·you⁺ and °the ⁼cosmos and I·will·¬show to·you °which⁺ I·should·do to·you

6 and they·¬took·away·themselves the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼cosmos of·them and °the ⁼¬attire off of·the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one Chōrēb

7 and taking ⁼Mosheh °the ⁼¬tent of·him ¬set·up out of·the ⁼¬barracks ¬far off of·the ⁼¬barracks and was·called ¬tent of·witness and was·generated·himself all ⁼the ⁼¬seeking °lord ¬departed·himself to °the ⁼¬tent out of·the ⁼¬barracks

8 ¬when then iᵮ ¬entered·himself Mosheh to °the ⁼¬tent out of·the ⁼¬barracks had·stood all ⁼the ⁼people ¬watching·out ¬each ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·him and they·¬observed of·¬going ⁼Mosheh ¬until of·the·one to·come·to °him to °the ⁼¬tent

9 as then iᵮ came·to Mosheh to °the ⁼¬tent ¬came the ⁼pillar of·the ⁼cloud and stood·himself upon °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent and spoke to·Mosheh

10 and ¬saw all ⁼the ⁼people °the ⁼pillar of·the ⁼cloud °having·stood upon of·the ⁼¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent and standing all ⁼the ⁼people they·¬worshipped ¬each off of·the ⁼¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent of·him

11 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh ¬face·to·face to·¬face·to·face as if whatever will·speak unto °the·one of·himself °¬friend and ¬released·himself to °the ⁼¬barracks then the ⁼¬servant ⁼Yesou ⁼son Nauē young not ¬departed·himself out of·the ⁼¬tent

12 and told Mosheh unto °lord ¬¡see! you to·me you·say ꜝ¬lead °the ⁼people ⁼this you then not you·¬made·clear to·me °which you·will·¬send·with with myˊ you then to·me you·told I·have·¬seen °you ¬from °all⁺ and °¬grace you·have ¬from to·me*

13 if therefore I·have·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you ꜝ¬show to·me °yourself ¬knowingly I·should·¬see °you ¬that iᵮ I·should·be having·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you and so·that I·should·know ¬that people of·you the ⁼nation ⁼the ⁼great ⁼this

14 and says he I·will·¬go·before·myself of·you and I·should·¬keep·from °you

15 and says unto °him if ńot he you you·should·¬travel·yourself ńot °me you·should·¬lead ¬from·here

16 and ¬how?! known will·be·himself ¬truly ¬that I·have·found °¬grace ¬from to·you I* also and the ⁼people of·you but or of·self-¬going·with of·you with of·us and I·will·be·¬been·glorified I* also and the ⁼people of·you ¬from °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ whatever⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth is

17 and told lord unto °Mosheh and °this to·you °the ⁼saying ⁼which you·have·¬said I·will·do you·have·found for °¬grace ¬before of·me and I·have·¬seen °you ¬from °all⁺

18 and says ꜝ¬show to·me °the·one of·yourself °¬glory

19 and told I* I·will·¬pass·by·myself ¬before of·you to·the ⁼¬glory of·me and I·should·call upon to·the ⁼name of·me lord ¬in·front·of of·you and I·will·¬have·mercy °which iᵮ I·should·¬have·mercy and I·will·¬have·compassion °which iᵮ I·should·¬have·compassion

20 and told not you·will·be·able·yourself to·¬see of·me °the ⁼¬face not for ńot should·¬see human °the ⁼¬face of·me and will·live·himself

21 and told lord ¬¡see! ¬place ¬from to·me* you·will·stand·yourself upon of·the ⁼rock

2 and ꜝbe·generated·yourself ¬ready to °the·one ¬early and you·will·¬ascend·yourself upon °the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one ¬Sinai and you·will·stand·yourself to·me there upon of·¬end ⁼the ⁼mountain

3 and ¬nothing ꜝlet·¬ascend with of·you ńot·then ꜝlet·be·¬seen in to·all ⁼the ⁼mountain and the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ ńot ꜝlet·them·¬feed⁺·themselves ¬near of·the ⁼mountain ⁼that

4 and ¬dressed·stone two °¬tablets⁺ ⁼stone⁺ ¬just·as and the⁺ ⁼first⁺ and ¬rising·at·dawn ⁼Mosheh ¬ascended to °the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one ¬Sinai ¬as ¬directed to·him lord and took Mosheh °the·ones⁺ two °¬tablets⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼stone⁺

13 °the⁺ ⁼¬altars⁺ of·them you⁺·will·¬take·down and °the⁺ ⁼¬monuments⁺ of·them you⁺·will·¬break and °the⁺ ⁼¬sacred·groves⁺ of·them you⁺·will·¬prevent and °the⁺ ⁼¬carving⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·them you⁺·will·¬burn in to·fire

17 and °Gods⁺ ⁼¬casted⁺ not you·will·do to·yourself

18 and °the ⁼¬festival of·the⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ you·will·¬keep·yourself seven °days⁺ you·will·¬eat·yourself °¬unleavened⁺ ¬just·as I·have·¬ordered·myself to·you to °the ⁼¬time in to·month of·the⁺ ⁼young⁺ in for to·month of·the⁺ ⁼young⁺ you·came·out out of·Egypt

28 and was there Mosheh ¬in·front·of of·lord forty °days⁺ and forty °nights⁺ °bread not ¬ate and water not drank and wrote °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬tablets⁺ of·the ⁼¬covenant °the·ones⁺ ten °sayings⁺

2 six °days⁺ you·will·do °works⁺ then to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh ¬rest holy shabbats⁺ ¬rest to·lord all ⁼the ⁼doing °work in to·her ꜝlet·¬decease

4 and told Mosheh unto °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying this ⁼the ⁼¬declaration ⁼which ¬directed lord ⁼saying

5 ꜝtake⁺ ¬from of·you⁺ of·them °¬choice·portion to·lord all ⁼the ⁼self-¬appreciating to·the ⁼heart they·will·¬bear °the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ to·lord °gold ⁼silver °copper

21 and they·¬bore ¬each of·which⁺ ¬bore of·them the ⁼heart and to·whatever⁺ ¬thought to·the ⁼soul of·them they·¬bore °¬choice·portion to·lord to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬upkeeps⁺ of·her and to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·the ⁼holy

24 and all ⁼the ⁼¬removing °¬choice·portion ⁼silver and °copper they·¬bore °the⁺ ⁼¬choice·portions⁺ to·lord and ¬from to·which⁺ was·found ¬woods⁺ ⁼¬incorruptible⁺ to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the·one ¬??? they·¬bore

25 and all ⁼woman ⁼wise to·the ⁼¬mind to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ to·¬spin they·¬bore °having·self-¬spun °the ⁼hyacinth and °the ⁼purple and °the ⁼¬scarlet and °the ⁼¬fine·linen

30 and told Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! has·¬called·by·name the ⁼God out of·name °the Beseleēl ⁼the·one of·the ⁼¬Uriah °the Ōr out of·¬tribe of·Yudah

31 and ¬filled·up °him °breath ⁼¬divine of·wisdom and of·¬understanding and of·¬higher·knowledge of·all⁺

34 and to·¬prompt ¬indeed gave to·him in to·the ⁼¬mind to·him also and Eliab ⁼the·one of·the Achisamak out of·¬tribe Dan

35 ¬filled·up °them of·wisdom and of·¬understanding ⁼¬mind °all to·¬understand to·do °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼holy and °the⁺ ⁼¬woven⁺ and °¬embroidered⁺ to·¬weave to·the ⁼¬scarlet and to·the ⁼¬fine·linen to·do °all ⁼work of·¬construction ⁼¬embroidery

36 and did Beseleēl and Eliab and all ⁼wise to·the ⁼¬mind to·which was·given wisdom and ¬higher·knowledge in to·them to·¬understand to·do °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ ⁼¬·fit ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬directed lord

2 and called Mosheh Beseleēl and Eliab and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having °the ⁼wisdom to·which gave the ⁼God °¬higher·knowledge in to·the ⁼heart and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬voluntarily °self-¬planing to·self-¬approach unto °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ¬so to·¬complete °them

3 and they·took ¬from of·Mosheh °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬choice·portions⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·¬bore the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼holy to·do °them and they they·¬waited·for·themselves ¬still °the⁺ ⁼self-¬bringing·to ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼¬bearing °the·one ¬early ¬early

4 and they·¬came·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼wise⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼doing °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼holy ¬each ¬according·to °the·one of·him °work ⁼which they they·worked·themselves

5 and they·told unto °Mosheh ¬that °¬multitude ¬bears the ⁼people ¬from °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬directed lord to·do

6 and ¬ordered Mosheh and ¬preached in to·the ⁼¬barracks saying ⁼man and woman ¬never·again ꜝlet·them·work⁺·themselves to °the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ of·the ⁼holy and was·¬prevented the ⁼people ¬still to·¬bring·to

7 and the⁺ ⁼works⁺ was to·them ¬sufficient⁺ to °the ⁼¬apparatus to·do and they·¬left·surplus

8 and did all ⁼wise in to·the⁺ ⁼self-working °the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ which⁺ they·are to·Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

9 and they·did °the ⁼¬shoulder-piece out of·gold and of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet of·having·self-¬spun and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined

10 and was·¬pruned the⁺ ⁼¬leafs⁺ of·the ⁼gold hair⁺ ¬so to·¬weave·together wiŧh to·the ⁼hyacinth and to·the ⁼purple and wiŧh to·the ⁼¬scarlet ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬spun and wiŧh to·the ⁼¬fine·linen ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬twined °work ⁼¬woven

11 they·did °it °¬shoulder-pieces⁺ ⁼¬holding out of·¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺

12 °work ⁼¬woven to °one·another⁺ °having·self-¬been·closely·joined ¬according·to °¬self out of·it they·did ¬according·to °the·one of·it °¬do out of·gold and of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬spun and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

13 and they·did °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼stones⁺ of·the ⁼¬emerald °having·self-¬clasped·together and ¬??? to·gold °having·self-¬carved and ¬??? °¬engravement of·seal out of·the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

14 and ¬put °them upon °the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ of·the ⁼¬shoulder-piece °stones⁺ of·¬memorial of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

15 and they·did °¬oracles ⁼work ⁼¬woven to·¬embroidery ¬according·to °the ⁼work of·the ⁼¬shoulder-piece out of·gold and of·hyacinth and of·purple and of·¬scarlet ⁼having·self-¬spun and of·¬fine·linen ⁼having·self-¬twined

16 °¬square ⁼¬double they·did °the ⁼¬oracles of·¬span °the ⁼¬length and of·¬span °the ⁼¬breadth ⁼¬double

17 and was·¬woven·together in to·it ¬woven·work ⁼¬inlaid·with·precious·stone ⁼¬arranged·in·four·rows ¬row of·stones⁺ ¬sardion and topaz and ¬emerald the ⁼¬row ⁼the ⁼one

18 and the ⁼¬row ⁼the ⁼second ⁼¬charcoal and sapphire and jasper

25 and to °the·ones⁺ two °¬compacts⁺ °the·ones⁺ two °¬wreaths⁺ and they·¬put upon °the·ones⁺ two °¬bezels⁺ and they·¬put upon °the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ of·the ⁼¬shoulder-piece out of·¬hostile ¬according·to °¬face

27 and they·did two °¬rings⁺ golden and they·¬put upon °¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ of·the ⁼¬shoulder-piece ¬from·below of·it ¬according·to °¬face ¬according·to °the ⁼¬compact ¬from·above of·the ⁼¬woven·part ⁼the ⁼¬shoulder-piece

37 and they·did to·the ⁼¬tent ten of·¬curtain

2 eight and twenty of·¬cubits⁺ °¬length of·the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼one the it they·were all⁺ and of·four⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬breadth of·the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼one

27 and did °the ⁼¬bathing·tub so·that they·should·¬wash·themselves out of·him Mosheh and Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·self-¬entering of·them to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness or ¬when they·should·¬approach·themselves unto °the ⁼¬altar to·¬minister they·¬washed·themselves out of·him ¬just·as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

39 all ⁼the ⁼gold ⁼which was·¬workouted to °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ¬according·to °all ⁼the ⁼¬work of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ was·generated·himself of·gold ⁼the·one of·the ⁼¬firstfruits nine and twenty °¬talents⁺ and ¬seven·hundred⁺ twenty shekels⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼shekel °the ⁼holy

2 and of·silver ¬choice·portion ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬visited ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼¬synagogue hundred ¬talents⁺ and thousand⁺ ⁼¬seven·hundred⁺ seventy five shekels⁺

3 ¬drachma ⁼one to·the ⁼head the ⁼¬half of·the ⁼shekel ¬according·to °the ⁼shekel °the ⁼holy all ⁼the ⁼self-¬passing·by °the ⁼¬review off of·twenty·years and ¬above to °the·ones⁺ sixty °myriads⁺ and three·thousand⁺ ⁼five·hundred⁺ and fifty

4 and was·been·generated the·ones⁺ hundred ¬talents⁺ of·the ⁼silver to °the ⁼¬molten·casting of·the·ones⁺ hundred of·¬scrolls⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent and to °the⁺ ⁼¬scrolls⁺ of·the ⁼¬curtain hundred ¬scrolls⁺ to °the·ones⁺ hundred °¬talents⁺ °¬talent to·the ⁼¬scroll

6 and the ⁼copper of·the ⁼¬choice·portion seventy ¬talents⁺ and thousand⁺ ⁼five·hundred⁺ ⁼shekels⁺

23 and ¬saw Mosheh °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ and they·were having·done °them °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh thus they·did °them and ¬praised °them Mosheh

40 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 in to·day ⁼one of·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first to·young·moon you·will·stand °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

3 and you·will·¬place °the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼witness and you·will·¬shelter °the ⁼¬ark to·the ⁼¬curtain

4 and you·will·¬bring·in °the ⁼¬table and you·will·¬plan °the ⁼¬purpose of·her and you·will·¬bring·in °the ⁼¬lampstand and you·will·¬put °the⁺ ⁼¬lamps⁺ of·her

5 and you·will·¬place °the ⁼¬altar ⁼the ⁼golden to °the·one to·¬burn·incense ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼¬ark and you·will·¬put °¬veil of·¬curtain upon °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

6 and °the ⁼¬altar of·the⁺ ⁼¬yields⁺ you·will·¬place ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

8 and you·will·¬put·on °the ⁼¬tent and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·her you·will·make·holy ¬surrounding

9 and you·will·take·yourself °the ⁼¬olive·oil of·the ⁼christening and you·will·christen °the ⁼¬tent and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·her and you·will·make·holy °her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·her and will·be·himself °holy⁺

10 and you·will·christen °the ⁼¬altar of·the⁺ ⁼¬yields⁺ and °all⁺ of·it °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ and you·will·make·holy °the ⁼¬altar and will·be·himself °the ⁼¬altar ⁼holy of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

12 and you·will·¬bring·near °Aharon and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him upon °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and you·will·¬wash °them to·water

13 and you·will·¬put·on °Aharon °the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and you·will·christen °him and you·will·make·holy °him and will·be·priest to·me

14 and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him you·will·¬bring·near and you·will·¬put·on °them ⁼tunics⁺

15 and you·will·¬anoint °them °which ⁼¬way you·¬anointed °the ⁼father of·them and they·will·be·priest to·me and will·be·himself ¬so to·be to·them christening of·priesthood to °the ⁼eternity to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·them

16 and did Mosheh °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·him lord thus did

17 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first to·the ⁼second ⁼year of·self-¬departing of·them out of·Egypt to·young·moon was·stood the ⁼¬tent

18 and stood Mosheh °the ⁼¬tent and ¬put °the⁺ ⁼¬scrolls⁺ and ¬inserted °the⁺ ⁼¬bars⁺ and stood °the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺

19 and ¬stretched·out °the⁺ ⁼¬curtains⁺ upon °the ⁼¬tent and ¬put °the ⁼¬overcovering of·the ⁼¬tent upon of·her ¬from·above ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

20 and taking °the⁺ ⁼witnesses⁺ threw·in to °the ⁼¬ark and ¬layed °the⁺ ⁼¬poles⁺ ¬by °the ⁼¬ark

21 and ¬brought·in °the ⁼¬ark to °the ⁼¬tent and ¬put °the ⁼¬overcovering of·the ⁼¬curtain and ¬sheltered °the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼witness °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

22 and ¬placed °the ⁼¬table to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness upon °the ⁼¬corner of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness °the·one unto °north ¬outside of·the ⁼¬curtain of·the ⁼¬tent

23 and ¬planed upon of·her °breads⁺ of·the ⁼¬purpose ¬before of·lord °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

24 and ¬placed °the ⁼¬lampstand to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness to °the ⁼¬corner of·the ⁼¬tent °the·one unto °south

25 and ¬put °the⁺ ⁼¬lamps⁺ of·her ¬before of·lord °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

26 and ¬placed °the ⁼¬altar ⁼the ⁼golden in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness ¬opposite of·the ⁼¬curtain

27 and ¬burned·incense upon of·it °the ⁼¬incense of·the ⁼¬composition ¬just·as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

29 and °the ⁼¬altar of·the⁺ ⁼¬yields⁺ ¬placed ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent

33 and stood °the ⁼¬palace ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬tent and of·the ⁼¬altar and ¬completed Mosheh °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺

34 and ¬covered the ⁼cloud °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and of·¬glory of·lord was·¬filled the ⁼¬tent

35 and not was·been·able Mosheh to·come·to to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness ¬that ¬overshadowed upon °her the ⁼cloud and of·¬glory of·lord was·¬filled the ⁼¬tent

36 ¬when then iᵮ ¬ascended the ⁼cloud off of·the ⁼¬tent they·¬broke·camp the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el wiŧh to·the ⁼¬chattel of·them

37 if then ńot ¬ascended the ⁼cloud not they·¬broke·camp ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼which ¬ascended the ⁼cloud

38 ⁼cloud for was upon of·the ⁼¬tent ⁼day and fire was upon of·her ⁼night ¬in·front·of of·all ⁼Yisra’el in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬marchings⁺ of·them
